20.04.05w. #231 brZanebulebis moqmedebis periodsac, xsenebuli 


brZanebulebis #1 danarTis me-18 pu


nqtis mixedviT, qveynis farglebs 


gareT mivlinebidan dabrunebulma 


mosamsaxurem dawesebulebas unda 


warudginos mgzavrobisaTvis faqtobrivad gaweuli xarjebis 


damadasturebeli sabuTebi, amave danarTis me-16 punqtiT, im SemTxvevaSi, 


rodesac mimRebi mxare uzrunvelyofs mosamsaxuris mivlinebasTan 


dakavSirebuli xarjebis srulad dafa


rvas, mosamsaxures miecema mxolod 


am brZanebulebis #3 danarTiT ga


nsazRvruli danamati, xolo #3 


danarTi iTvaliswinebs danamatis gace


mas maRali rangis Tanamdebobis 


pirTaTvis, romelsac mosarCele g. a-i ar ganekuTvneboda. amdenad, 


sakasacio palata Tvlis, rom gasa

xarjebis anazRaurebis xsenebul


i wesebis gauTvaliswineblad, 


sasamarTlom ar gamoiyena norma, ro


melic unda gamoey


enebina (ssk-is 393-


e muxlis me-2 nawilis ,,a” qvep


unqti), gasaCivrebuli ganCineba 


iuridiulad ar aris sakmarisad dasa


buTebuli (ssk-is 394-e muxlis ,,e” 


qvepunqti), rac sakasacio saCivris absolutur safuZvels qmnis. 


mosamsaxuris mivlinebaSi gaSveba da


 Sesabamisi samivlinebo Tanxebis 


anazRaureba drois garkveul periods ukavSirdeba, samivlinebo Tanxebis 


anazRaureba warmoadgens periodulad 


Sesasrulebel valdebulebas, masze 


vrceldeba sk-is 129-e muxlis me-2 nawiliT gansazRvruli 


xandazmulobis vada. amdenad, saapelacio palatas unda emsjela g. a-is 


mier kanonmdeblobiT gansazRvruli


 sasarCelo xandazmulobis vadis 


dacvaze. 


aRniSnulidan gamomdinare, saka


sacio sasamarTlo Tvlis, rom 


arsebobs gasaCivrebuli ganCinebis 


gauqmebis da ssk-is 412-e muxlis 


Sesabamisad saqmis xelaxali ganxil


visaTvis saapelacio sasamarTloSi 


dabrunebis safuZveli. saapelacio 


sasamarTlos mier 


srulad ar iqna 


gamorkveuli saqmis faqtobrivi gare


moebebi, rac ar iZleva saqmeze 


saboloo gadawyvetilebis miRebis Se


saZleblobas. saqmis xelaxali 


ganxilvisas saqmeze unda dadgindes 


davis gadawyvetisaTvis arsebiTi 


mniSvnelobis mqone faqtobrivi garemo


eba, kerZod is Tu


 vis mier iqna 


gaweuli samivlinebo xarjebi (mgzavro

brivi aspeqtebi 


unda gadawydes zemoaRniSnuli normatiuli aqtebiT dadgenili wesebis

ganCineba unda gauqmdes da saqme zemoaRniSnuli miTiTebebiT arsebiTi

ladakargulad cnobis Taobaze”

los mTavrobis 22.04.05w., #76-e 


dadgenilebis safuZvelze. mosarCelee


bi samsaxuridan gaTavisufldnen 


saqarTvelos energetikis ministris

saapelacio sasamarTlom welTa na


msaxurobis mixedviT saxelfaso 


danamatis anazRaurebis moTxovnis 


dakmayofilebisas miuTiTa `sajaro 


samsaxuris Sesaxeb~ kanonis 37-e muxlis me-2 punqtze, romelic 


mosarCeleTa gaTavisuflebis droisa


Tvis moqmedi redaqciiT adgenda, 


rom, SromiTi gasamrjelos (xelfasi


s) garda mosamsaxures eZleoda 


danamati namsaxurevi wlebisaTvis 


Tanamdebobrivi sargos Semdegi 


odenobiT: 5 wlamde - 10%, 5-dan 10


-wlamde _ 20%, 10-dan 15-wlamde _ 


25%, 15 weli da meti _ 30%. 


pirveli instanciis sasamarTlo


s gadawyvetilebis sarezolucio 


nawilis me-3 punqtis Tanaxmad, ro


melic ucvlelad darCa saapelacio 


palatis gasaCivrebuli ganCinebiT, mo


pasuxes _ saqarTvelos energetikis 


saministros daevala mosarCeleebisaTv


is welTa namsaxurobis danamatis 


anazRaureba, TiToeuli mosarCelis na


msaxurebi wlebis gaTvaliswinebiT. 


sakasacio sasamarTlos miaCnia, rom da


vis sagani welaTa namsaxurobis  


mixedviT saxelfaso danamatis anazra


urebis nawilSi dasazustebeli iyo, 


kerZod, arc sasarCelo gancxadeba


Si da arc ganxilvis procesSi 


mosarCeleebs ar dauzustebiaT Tu 


drois ra periods exeboda welTa 


namsaxurobis mixedviT saxelfaso 


danamatis anazRaurebis moTxovna, 


gaurkvevelia agreTve TiToeuli mo


sarCelis namsaxurevi wlebi da 


Sesabamisad is, Tu ra procentuli ga


nakveTebiT moiTxoves mosarCeleebma 


Tanamdebobrivi sargos anazRaureba.


 sakasacio sasamarTlo Tvlis, rom 


saapelacio sasamarTlos unda daez


ustebina TiToeuli mosarCelis 


moTxovna am nawilSi, daedgina TiTo


euli mosarCelis Tanamdebobrivi 


ganakveTi, danamatis procentuli odenoba, romelsac moiTxovdnen 


mosarCeleebi, Sromis wignakebidan amonawerebis gamokvlevis Sedegad unda 


dadgeniliyo moTxovnaTa Sesabamiso


ba namsaxureb welTa odenobaze 


dadgenil procentul ganakveTTan.

sasarCelo moTxovnebis dazustebis


, davis gadasawyvetad saWiro 


faqtobrivi garemoebebis dadgenis

dabrunebis safuZvels qmnis.

2007 wlis 23 agvistos f. s-


ma sasarCelo gancxadebiT mimarTa 


Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos ad


ministraciul saqmeTa kolegias, 


mopasuxe saqarTvelos Tavdacvis sa


ministros mimarT, davalianebis 


anazRaurebis Taobaze. 


     mosarCele sasarCelo gancxadebaSi miuTiTebda, rom 1992-2002 


wlebSi msaxurobda saqarTvelos 


SeiaraRebuli Zalebis rigebSi.

moqmedebebis dros miRebuli Wril

darCa 1998-2000 wlebis xelfasi – 1471 lari.

eblod dakisreboda 1471 laris 


anazRureba.

axuris statusis Sesaxeb"

4 muxlis Sesabamisad, samxedro mosamsaxuris socialuri da 


samarTlebrvi dacvis garantias

socialuri dacvis garantiebi 


ganisazRvreba saqarTvelos Se


sabamisi kanonmdeblobiT.  


    amave kanonis me-12 muxlis Sesa


bamisad, samxedro mosamsaxure srul 


saxelmwifo kmayofaze imyofeba, am


asTan, samxedro mosamsaxures

tiuli xasiaTisaa da amdenad,

sasursaTo ulufa, radgan am 


moTxovnis uflebis realizebis

vrceldeba am kanoniT gansazRvrul

sajaro samsaxurTan dakavSirebuli is


 urTierToba, rac am kanoniT ar 


wesrigdeba, regulirdeba Sesa


bamisi kanonmdeblobiT.

6 wlis) 31-e muxlis me-2 nawiliT, 


Sromis anazRaureba gaicema TveSi er

dros moqmedi ,,Sromis kanonTa kode


qsis~ 81-e muxlis pirveli punqtis

anazRaureba xdeba droeblivad, 94-e 


muxlis pirveli punqtiT xelfasi gaic


ema yoveli naxevari Tvis Semdeg

gaTvaliswinebuli, amave kanonis 96-e

misi daTxovnisas kuTvnili Tanxa eZleva daTxovnis dRes.

Sesaxeb~ saqarTvelos kanonis me-14 muxliT _ saqarTvelos Sromis

re mosamsaxureebze vrceldeba am

samsaxurTan dakavSirebuli is urTierToba, rac am kanoniT ar 


wesrigdeba, regulirdeba Se


sabamisi kanonmdeblobiT. 


 aqedan gamomdinare, kanonieria


 sajaro SromiTi saxelSekrulebo 


urTierTobisas warmoSobili davis dr


os gamoyenebul iqnes saqarTvelos 


samoqalaqo kodeqsis 129-e muxli. 


    kasatoris 


ganmar


tebiT, saqarTvelos samoqalaqo kodeqsi kerZo 


samarTlebrivi urTierTobis mareguli


rebeli ZiriTadi sakanonmdeblo 


aqtia, magram misi normebi xSir


 SemTxvevaSi im urTierTobebis 


maregulirebel normebadac gvevlineba, romlebic Tavisi SinaarsiT 


warmoadgens administraciul


 (sajaro) urTierTobebs. 


24 


sayuradReboa, ganisazRvros, mosa


rCelesa da Tavdacvis saministros 


Soris arsebuli urTierToba warmoa


dgenda Tu ara saxelSekrulebo 


urTierTobas. aRniSnuli urTierToba


 saxelSekrulebo urTierToba iyo 


im martivi garemoebidan 


gamomdinare, rom mosarCel


is gancxadeba _ nebis 


gamovlena _ Tavdacvis saministros 


sistemaSi samsaxuris dawyebis 


Sesaxeb (oferti) da saministros Tanx


moba (aqcefti _ brZanebis saxiT), 


masTan SromiTi urTierTobis damyarebis Sesaxeb, aseve am or subieqts 


Soris urTierTobis da maTi ufle


ba-movaleobebis ganmsazRvreli 


samarTlebrivi aqtebi erTobliobaSi


 warmoadgenen mosarCelesa da 


saministros Soris faqtobrivi sa


jaro SromiTi saxelSekrulebo 


urTierTobis arsebobis 


faqts da amis dasadastureblad sruliad ar 


aris saWiro erTiani, garkveul 


sistemaSi moyvanili an garkveuli 


formis mqone dokumentis _ xelSekrulebis arseboba. 


aqedan gamomdinare, kanonmdebloba ar avaldebulebs mxareebs 


konkretuli Sinaarsisa da stilis


 mqone dokumentis gaformebas 


xelSekrulebis dadebisas. xelSekrulebaTa formebi da stili SeiZleba 


iyos gansxvavebuli da Sesabamisad, 


werilobiTi gancxadeba da brZaneba 


Tanamdebobaze daniSvnis, erToblioba


Si warmoadgens werilobiTi SromiTi 


xelSekrulebis arsebobis damadasturebel dokumentebs. 


aRniSnuli midgoma saxelmwifos mier aseve faqtobrivad 


aRiarebulia "Sromis kodeqsis" me-6 muxlis me-3 nawiliTac _ piris 


gancxadeba da mis safuZvelze damsaqmeblis mier gamocemuli dokumenti, 


romliTac dasturdeba damsaqmeblis neba piris samuSaoze miRebis 


Taobaze, uTanabrdeba SromiT


i xelSekrulebis dadebas. 


is faqti, rom sajaro sa


msaxurze vrceldeba SromiTi 


kanonmdebloba, udavoa, ufro meti


c, "sajaro samsaxuris Sesaxeb" 


saqarTvelos kanonis me-14 muxlis 


me-2 punqtiT sajaro samsaxurTan 


dakavSirebuli is urTierToba, rac "s


ajaro samsaxuris 


Sesaxeb" kanoniT 


ar wesrigdeba, regulirdeba Sesaba


misi kanonmdeblobiT. amdenad, 


saxelfaso davalianebeb


is xandazmulobis sakiTxze, romelic ar 


wesrigdeba miTiTebuli kanoniT, unda gavrceldes Sesabamisi 


kanonmdebloba, anu: a) 


im SemTxvevaSi, Tu xelfasis valdebulebas mieca 


saxelSekrulebo valdebulebis kvalifikacia, vrceldeba samoqalaqo 


kodeqsiT dadgenili samwliani xandaz


mulobis vada; b) im SemTxvevaSi, 


Tu xelfasis gacemis valdebulebas


 miecema administraciuli organos 


mier samsaxurebriv sakiTxze moqmedebis ganxorcielebis valdebulebis 


kvalifikacia, vrceldeba "sajaro samsaxuris Sesaxeb" saqarTvelos 


25 


kanonis 127-e muxlis pirveli 


punqtiT dadgenili erTTviani 


xandazmulobis vada. 


    ssk-is 130-e muxlis mixedviT, rogorc ssk-is 129-e muxliT 


gaTvaliswinebuli samwliani xandaz


mulobis, ise "sajaro samsaxuris 


Sesaxeb" saqarTvelos ka


nonis 127-e muxliT gaTvaliswinebuli erTTviani 


xandazmulobis vadis aTvla daiwyo im


 dRidan, rodesac mosarCeles unda 


mieRo TiToeuli Tvis an periodis


 jildo, kvebis kompensacia an 


materialuri daxmareba.  


rogorc cnobilia, sarCeli sasa


marTloSi Setanilia 2007 wels. 


amdenad, sarCelis Setanis dros


 mosarCeles gaSvebuli hqonda 


rogorc ssk-is 129-e muxliT gaTvaliswinebuli samwliani 


xandazmulobis, ise "sajaro samsaxur


is Sesaxeb" saqarTvelos kanonis 


127-e muxliT gaTvaliswinebuli 


erTTviani xandazmulobis vadebi. 


     im dros moqmedi "Sromis ka


nonTa kodeqsis" 81-e muxlis pirveli 


punqtis Tanaxmad, mosamsaxureebi


s Sromis anazRaureba xdeboda 


etapobrivad, 94-e muxlis pirveli punqtiT xelfasi gaicemoda yoveli 


naxevari Tvis Semdeg mainc, Tu Sromis xelSekrulebiT (kontraqtiT) 


sxva ram ar iyo gaTvaliswinebuli. 


amdenad, udaoa, rom xelfasis 


gacema warmoadgenda periodul 


valdebulebas, romlis moTxovnaze


 vrceldeba "sajaro samsaxuris 


Sesaxeb" saqarTvelos 


kanonis 127-e muxliT dadgenili erTTviani 


xandazmulobis vada, xolo ukidures 


SemTxvevaSi, ssk-is 129-e muxliT 


dadgenili xandazmulobis samwliani 


vada. yovelive zemoaRniSnulidan 


gamomdinare, mosarCelis TiToeuli Tvis saxelfaso moTxovnis 


xandazmulobaze damoukideblad unda warimarTos msjeloba. 


     "sajaro 


samsaxuris 


Sesaxe


b" saqarTvelos kanonis me-11.2 "T" 


qvepunqtiT samxedro mosamsaxureebz


e am kanonis moqmedeba vrceldeba 


mxolod im SemTxvevebSi, Tu saqarTvelos konstituciiT, specialuri 


kanonmdeblobiT an maT safuZvelze


 sxva ram ar aris dadgenili. 


     amdenad, 


xelfasis 


arsze 


da mis Semadgenel komponentebze 


msjelobisas gaTvaliswinebuli unda


 iqnes 1998-2000 wlebSi moqmedi 


"samxedro mosamsaxuris statusis Sesa


xeb" kanonis moTx


ovnebi, xolo am 


kanonmdeblobaSi gansxvavebuli debu


lebebis ararsebobis SemTxvevaSi, 


sadavo urTierToba mogvarebul unda iqnes "sajaro samsaxuris Sesaxeb" 


saqarTvelos kanonis debulebebiT, ke


rZod, misi 37-e muxliT (1998-2000 


wlebis redaqciiT), mo


samsaxuris SromiTi ga


samrjelo (xelfasi) 


moicavs Tanamdebobriv sargos, prem


ias da kanoniT gaTvaliswinebul 


danamatebs. 


26 


     aRniSnulidan gamomdinare, 


imisaTvis, rom ama Tu im finansur 


gasacemels mieces xelfasze danama


tis statusi da CaiTvalos xelfasis 


Semadgenel elementad, saWiroa, am fulad gasacemels (kvartaluri 


premia, kvebis kompensacia), kanonmde


blobis mixedviT, hqondes "danamatis" 


statusi. 


    kasatoris ganmartebiT, "samxe


dro mosamsaxuris statusis Sesaxeb" 


saqarTvelos kanonis me-3 muxlis


 mesame punqtiT _ samxedro 


mosamsaxures (savaldebulo samxedro mosamsaxuris garda), saqarTvelos 


kanonmdeblobiT dadgenili normiT, saxelmwifos xarjze eZleva 


sasursaTo ulufa da formis tans


acmeli an Sesabamisi fuladi 


kompensacia. 


amave muxlis mesame punqtiT _ oficers Tanamdebobaze namsaxuri 


kalendaruli wlebis (maT Soris, y


ofili ssrk-is da sxva saxelmwifos 


SeiaraRebul ZalebSi) mixedviT eZleva Tanamdebobriv da samxedro 


wodebebis fulad sargoebze procentu


li danamatebi namsaxurobisaTvis 


Semdegi odenobiT: 1-dan 2 wlamde _ 5%; 2-dan 5 wlamde _ 10%; 5-dan 


10 wlamde _ 20%; 10-dan 15 wlamde _ 25%; 15-dan 20 wlamde _ 40%; 


30 welze meti _ 45%. 


    rogorc "samxedro mosamsaxur


is statusis Sesaxeb" saqarTvelos 


kanonis me-12 muxlis meore punqti


dan irkveva, "danamatis" statusi 


miniWebuli aqvs mxolod fulad Tanxebs, romelic daiangariSeba 


namsaxuris wlebis mixedviT. rac S


eexeba kvartalur premias da kvebis 


kompensacias, "samxedro mosamsaxuris


 statusis Sesaxeb" saqarTvelos 


kanonis me-12 muxlis meore da mesame punqtebidan gamomdinare, 


"danamatis" statusi ar aqvs miniWebuli. 


 aqedan gamomdinare, 


calsaxaa, rom kvartaluri


 premia da kvebis 


kompensaciis Tanxebi ar warmoadg


ens "sajaro samsaxuris Sesaxeb" 


saqarTvelos kanonis 37.1 muxliT 


gaTvaliswinebul xelfasSi Semaval 


danamatebs da isini xelfasisagan damoukidebel fulad gasacemels 


warmoadgens. 


     kasatoris ganmar


tebiT, sasarCelo moTxovna


 kvebis kompensaciis, 


jildosa da materialuri daxmarebis


 nawilSi xandazmulia, radgan 


amgvar moTxovnebze vrceldeba ssk-is 


129-e muxliT dadg


enili samwliani 


xandazmulobis vada. 


    MamasTan, 


kasato


ris mosazrebiT, saapel


acio sasamarTlom ar 


gaiTvaliswina is garemoeba, rom saqm


eSi arsebuli saministros Sesabamisi 


struqturuli erTeulebis mier gace


muli 25.07.07 wlis cnoba ver 


CaiTvleba valis aRiarebad, vinaidan


 masSi ar aris miTiTebuli valis

aRiareba da misi gadaxdis dapire


baze. aRniSnuli cnoba infrmaciuli 


xasiaTisaa da gacemulia szak-iT da


dgenili informaciis

farglebaSi.

     "samxedro mosamsaxuris stat


usis Sesaxeb" saqarTvelos kanonis 


me-12 muxlis me-3 punqtis Sesabamisad, samxedro mosamsaxures 


saqarTvelos kanonmdeblobiT dadgen


ili normiT, saxelmwifos xarjze 


eZleva sasursaTo ulufa 


da formis tansacmeli an Sesabamisi fuladi 


kompensacia. 


    `sajaro samsaxuris Sesaxeb~


 saqarTvelos kanonis 37-e muxlis 


pirveli punqtis meore winadadebaSi mocemulia mosamsaxuris xelfasis 


cneba, romlis Tanaxmad, mosamsaxur


is SromiTi gasamrjelo (xelfasi) 


moicavs Tanamdebobriv sargos, prem


ias da kanoniT gaTvaliswinebul 


danamatebs.  


28 


sakasacio sasamarTlo ganmartavs, 


Tanamdebobrivi sargos garda, 


SromiT gasamrjelos (xelfass) mi


ekuTvneba aseve premia da is 


danamatebi, romlebic kanoniTaa gaTv


aliswinebuli. kvebis kompensacia 


warmoadgens `samxedro mosamsaxuris


 statusis Sesaxeb" saqarTvelos 


kanonis me-12 muxlis me-3 punq


tiT reglamentirebul sasursaTo 


ulufas. aRniSnuli kanonis me-12 muxl


is me-3 punqtis (2007 wlis 11 


maisamde moqmedi redaqcia) mixedviT, samxedro mosamsaxures 


saqarTvelos kanonmdeblobiT dadgeni


li normiT saxelmwifos xarjze 


eZleoda sasursaTo ulufa da form


is tansacmeli an Sesabamisi 


fuladi kompensacia. amdenad, 


samxedro mosamsaxure samxedro 


samsaxuris periodSi `s


ajaro samsaxuris Sesaxe


b~ saqarTvelos kanonis

iT gasamrjelosTan (xelfasTan) 


erTad, Rebulobs kompensacias sa


sursaTo uzrunvelyofis _ ulufis 


saxiT. `sajaro samsaxuris Sesaxeb~

normis Semcveli 134


1


-e muxlis (angariSsworebis wesi samsaxuridan 


gaTavisuflebisas) Tanaxmad, 2005

gaTavisuflebul sajaro mosamsaxur


eze kuTvnili Tanxis (garda am 


kanoniT gansazRvruli kompensaciisa)


 gacema unda ganxorcieldes wina 


wlebSi warmoqmnili sabiujeto 


davalianebis dafarvis wesis 


Sesabamisad. amdenad, aRniSnuli 


muxliT reglamentirebulia sajaro 


mosamsaxureze wina wlebSi warmoS


obili davalianebis anazRaureba, 


magram igi ar exeba sajaro mo


samsaxurisaTvis kompensaciis 


anazRaurebas am muxliT dadg


enili wesiT. sasursaTo ulufa

amavdroulad, periodul


ad Sesasrulebel valdebulebas. amasTan,

i    n a w i l i: 


  09.10.07w. e. m-ma sasarCelo ga


ncxadebiT mimarTa Tbilisis saqalaqo 


sasamarTlos administraciul saqmeT


a kolegias mopasuxe saqarTvelos

moiTxova saxelfaso davalianebis 


anazRaureba. Tbilisis 


saqalaqo sasamarTlos administraciul saqmeTa 


kolegiis 24.10.07w. gadawyvetilebiT e. m-is sarCeli dakmayofilda. 


saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministros 


daekisra e. m-is sasargeblod 


saxelfaso davalianebis 13


49, 86 laris gadaxda.

ministraciul saqmeTa kolegiis

Tavdacvis saministrom.

saministros e. m-is sasargeblod

mier dadgenili faqtobrivi garemo

saapelacio palatam `sajaro samsaxuris Sesaxeb~ saqarTvelos kanonis 


37-e muxlis 1-li nawilis, `samxe


dro samsaxuris statusis Sesaxeb~

 nawilisa da saqmeSi warmodgenili 


cnobebis safuZvelze miiCnia, ro


m pirveli instanciis sasamarTlom 


marTebulad daakisra saqarTvelos

sasargeblod xelfasis – 410,11 lari


s, materialuri daxmarebis – 61.16 


laris da jildos – 209,10 laris 


anazRaureba. saapelacio palatam 


valis aRiarebis faqtad miiCnia saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministros 


finansebis marTvis departamentis 01


.10.07w. 9/3016 cnoba, romliTac 


Tavdacvis  saministro e. m-s dapi


rda davalianebis anazRaurebas am 


miznebisaTvis saxelmwifo biujetidan damatebiT gamoyofili asignebebis 


farglebSi. saapelacio palatam ar


 gaiziara pirveli instanciis 


sasamarTlos msjeloba kvebis komp


ensaciis 669,49 laris odenobiT 


anazRaurebis nawilSi, vinaidan sa


sursaTo ulufa warmoadgenda samxedro 


mosamsaxuris uzrunvelyofis saxe


s da amavdroulad periodulad 


Sesasrulebel valdebulebas. igi ar warmoadgenda `sajaro samsaxuris 


Sesaxeb~ saqarTvelos kanonis 37-e


 muxliT gansazRvrul xelfasis 


komponents. saapelacio palati


s mosazrebiT, xelfasi Tavisi 


samarTlebrivi bunebiT gansxvavde


boda socialuri uzrunvelyofis 


saxisgan – sasursaTo ulufisagan, 


romelic kanonmdeblis mier sxva 


samarTlebriv reJimSi iyo moqceuli 


da `sajaro samsaxuris Sesaxeb~ 


saqarTvelos kanonis 134


1


 muxliT regulirebul sferos ar 


ganekuTvneboda, romlis mixedviTac 20


05 wlis 1 ianvramde samsaxuridan 


gaTavisuflebul sajaro mosamsaxuree


bze kuTvnili Tanxis (garda am 


kanoniT gansazRvruli kompensaciisa) gacema unda xorcielebodes wina 


wlebSi warmoqmnili sabiujeto davalia


nebis dafarvis wesis Sesabamisad. 


amdenad, mis mimarT, rogorc socialuri uzrunvelyofis periodulad 


Sesasrulebeli valdebulebis mima


rT, gamoyenebul unda yofiliyo 


saqarTvelos samoqalaqo kodeqsis


 129-e muxlis meore nawiliT 


gansazRvruli  sasarCelo xandazmu


lobis samwliani vada, rac aTvlili 


unda yofiliyo sasamarTloSi sarCel


is wardgenis TariRidan ukusvliT. 


33 


amave kodeqsis 137-e muxlis Sesaba


misad, xandazmulobis vada wydeba 


valdebuli piris mier uflebamosili


 piris winaSe valis aRiarebiT, 


rasac mocemul SemTvevaSi adgili ar hqonia 


   Tbilisis saapelacio sasamar


Tlos administraciul saqmeTa palatis 


21.02.08w. gadawyvetileba sakasa


cio wesiT gaasaCivra saqarTvelos 


Tavdacvis saministrom. ka


satorma aRniSnuli gadawyvetilebis gauqmeba da 


axali gadawyvetilebis miRebiT mosa


rCelisaTvis sasarCelo moTxovnis 


dakmayofilebaze uari


s Tqma moiTxova. 


kasatorma aRniSna, rom `sajaro sa


msaxuris Sesaxeb~


 kanonis me-14 


muxlis safuZvelze, SromiTi urTierTo


bebis mowesrigebis


as gamoyenebul 


unda yofiliyo Sromis kanonTa ko


deqsis normebi, xolo aqedan 


gamomdinare sajaro Srom


iTi urTierTobebis mowesr


igebisas gamoyenebul 


unda yofiliyo saqarTvelos samoqala


qo kodeqsis normebi. mosarCelesa 


da Tavdacvis saministros Soris ar


sebuli urTierToba warmoadgenda 


saxelSekrulebo urTierTobas, radgan 


mosarCelis gancxadeba Tavdacvis 


saministros sistemaSi samsaxuris dawyebis Sesaxeb da saministros 


Tanxmoba masTan SromiTi urTierTobi


s damyarebis Sesaxeb adasturebdnen 


sajaro SromiTi urTierTobis faqts. 


kasatorma aRniSna, rom im dros 


moqmedi Sromis kanonTa kodeqsis mixe


dviT xelfasis gacema warmoadgenda 


periodulad Sesasrulebel valdebulebas


, radgan am kanonis 94-e muxlis 


mixedviT, xelfasi gaicemoda yoveli naxevari Tvis mere mainc, Tu 


SromiTi xelSekrulebiT sxva ram ar


 iyo gaTvaliswinebuli. aqedan 


gamomdinare, saxelfaso moTxovnaze unda gavrcelebuliyo `sajaro 


samsaxuris Sesaxeb~ kanonis 12


7-e muxliT dadgenili erTTviani 


xandazmulobis vada, xolo


 ukidures SemTvevaSi ssk-is 129-e muxliT 


dadgenili xandazmulobis samwliani va


da. kasatorma aseve miuTiTa, rom 


`samxedro mosamsaxuris statusis Sesa


xeb~ kanonis me-12 muxlis me-3 da 


me-4 punqtebidan irkveoda, rom danamatis statusi miniWebuli hqonda 


mxolod fulad Tanxebs, romlebic ga


iangariSeboda namsaxurebis wlebis 


mixedviT, xolo jildos da materialur daxmarebas danamatis statusi 


ar hqonda miniWebuli da isini ar


 warmoadgendnen `sajaro samsaxuris 


Sesaxeb~ kanonis 37-e muxlis 1-li nawiliT gaTvaliswinebul xelfasSi 


Semaval danamatebs, isini xelfasisagan damoukidebel fulad gasacemels 


warmoadgendnen. sasarCelo moTxovna 


materialuri daxmarebis da jildos 


nawilSi iyo xandazmuli, 


radgan am moTxovnebze 


vrceldeboda ssk-is 129-


e muxliT dadgenili 3 wliani xaan


dazmulobis vada


. A  kasatorma 


sakasacio saCivarSi  miuTiTa, rom mi


si sakasacio saCivari dasaSvebi iyo 


34 


saqarTvelos administraciuli saproc


eso kodeqsis 34-e muxlis me-3 


nawilis `a~, `b~ da `g~ qvepunqtebis Sesabamisad. 


saqarTvelos uzenaesi sasamar


Tlos administraciul da sxva 


kategoriis saqmeTa palatis 13.05.08w.


 ganCinebiT saqarTvelos Tavdacvis 


saministros sakasacio saCivari saqa


rTvelos administraciuli saproceso 


kodeqsis 34-e muxlis me-3 nawi


lis Sesabamisad, dasaSvebobis 


Sesamowmeblad warmoebaSi iqna miRe


buli. mxareebs sa


kasacio saCivris 


dasaSvebobasTan dakavSirebiT mosazrebebis warmodgenis ufleba miecaT da 


ganesazRvraT vada. Tavdacvis sami


nistrom warmoadgina mosazreba, 


romelSic miuTiTebda, rom sakasacio sa


Civari dasaSvebi iyo sask-is 34-e 


muxlis me-3 nawilis `a~, `b~ da `g~ qvepunqtebis Sesabamisad. 


 s a m o t i v a c i o  


     n a w i l i : 


 sakasacio sasamarTlo gasaCivrebul


i ganCinebis gacnobis, sakasacio 


saCivris safuZvlianobis Semowmebis Sedegad Tvlis, rom          


saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministros saka


sacio saCivari dauSveblad  unda 


iqnes miCneuli Semdeg garemoebaTa gamo: 


 sakasacio sasamarTlos miaCnia, 


rom saapelacio sasamarTlom saqme 


ganixila arsebiTi procesualuri 


darRvevebis gareSe da saqmeze 


arsebiTad swori gadawyvetilebaa mi


Rebuli. mocemuli saqme ar aris 


mniSvnelovani samarTlis ganviTareb


isa da erTgvarovani sasamarTlo 


praqtikis CamoyalibebisaTvis.  


sakasacio sasamarTlo Tvlis, ro


m am SemTxvevaS


i ar arsebobs 


saapelacio sasamarTlos mier gamo


yenebuli saproceso da materialuri 


samarTlis normebis ganmartebisa da


 samarTlis ganviTarebis mizniT 


sakasacio sasamarTlos mi


er zogadi mniSvnelobis mqone saxelmZRvanelo 


da sarekomendacio gadawyvetilebis ga


motanis faqtobrivi saWiroeba.   


sakasacio sasamarTlos mosazrebiT


, aRniSnul saqmes ar gaaCnia 


araviTari principuli mniSvneloba 


sasamarTlo praqtikisaTvis, xolo 


sakasacio saCivars _ wa


rmatebis perspeqtiva. 


aRniSnulidan gamomdinare, sakasa


cio sasamarTlos miaCnia, rom am 


konkretul SemTxvevaSi ar arsebobs 


sakasacio saCivris dasaSvebobis 


saqarTvelos administraciuli saproc


eso kodeqsis 34-e muxlis me-3 


nawiliT gansazRvruli arc erTi sa


fuZveli, ris gamoc saqarTvelos 


Tavdacvis saministros sakasacio sa


Civari ar unda iqnes daSvebuli 


gansaxilvelad.

s a r e z o l u c i o  


     n a w i l i : 


sakasacio sasamarTlom ixelmZRvanela saqarTvelos 


administraciuli saproceso kodeqsis pi


rveli muxlis me-2 nawiliT, 34-e 


muxlis me-3 nawiliT da 


       d 


a a d g i n a : 


1.


saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministro


s sakasacio saCivari miCneul 


iqnes dauSveblad; 


2.


saqarTvelos uzenaesi sasamarTlo


s ganCineba sabolooa da ar 


saCivrdeba.

          n. sxirtlaZe 


          mosamarTleebi:          


      n. qadagiZe 


       l. murusiZe

saproceso kodeqsis pirveli 


muxlisa da 34-e muxlis me-3 


nawilis safuZvelze, saqarTvelos 


samoqalaqo saproceso kodeqsis


 408-e muxlis me-3 nawilis 


Sesabamisad, zepiri ganxilvis gare


Se, Seamowma saqarTvelos finansTa 


saministros Semosavlebis samsaxuris


 sakasacio saCivris dasaSvebobis 


safuZvlebis arseboba quTais


is saapelacio sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqmeTa palatis 2008 wlis 30 aprilis ganCinebis 


gauqmebis Taobaze.

2007 wlis 14 Tebervals i/m `...

inspeqciis mimarT.

wlis 13 Tebervals mas Cahbarda

.....” mier Sesrulebul iqna 2005 wlis 


1 ianvramde moqmedi saqarTvelos saga


dasaxado kodeqsis moTxovnebi, rac 


dasturdeboda sarCelze TandarTuli cnobebiT. ganxorcielebuli 


sameurneo operaciebis Se


sabamisad, momsaxure sagadasaxado inspeqciaSi 


wardgenil iqna deklaraciebi da 


ganxorcielda saxelmwifo biujetTan 


angariSsworeba. Sesrulebuli iyo sa


qarTvelos sagadasaxado kodeqsis 


(1997 wlis redaqcia), rogorc 114-e,


 aseve 115-e muxlebis moTxovnebi 


da ar arsebobda miRebu


li CaTvlebis gauqmebis 


araviTari safuZveli. 


zemoaRniSnulidan gamomdinare, mosarCelem moiTxova quTaisis 


sagadasaxado inspeqciis 2007


 wlis 12 Tebervlis #07/872 


administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqtis baTilad cnoba, gauqmebuli 


CaTvlebis aRdgena da masze ricxul


i sauravebis Ca


mowera Semdeg

quTaisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 20


07 wlis 27 martis ganCinebiT 


mocemul saqmeSi mesame pirad Caeba 


saqarTvelos finansTa saministros 


sagadasaxado departamentis baTumi


s sagadasaxado inspeqcia.   


quTaisis saqalaqo sasamarTlo


s 2007 wlis 31 agvistos 


gadawyvetilebiT i/m `....~ sarCeli da


kmayofilda; quTaisis sagadasaxado 


inspeqcias daevala i/m `....~ dari


cxuli dRg-s _ 388162 laris aRdgena 


da masze daricxuli sauravis gauqmeba. 


saqalaqo sasamarTlom aRniSna, 


rom saqarTvelos sagadasaxado 


kodeqsis me-2 muxlis me-2 nawilis Tanaxmad, gadasaxadebiT 


dabegvrisaTvis gamoiyeneboda saqarT


velos sagadasaxado kanonmdeblobis 


oficialurad gamoqveynebuli da Zala


Si Sesuli is normatiuli aqtebi, 


romlebic moqmedebda sagadasaxado va


ldebulebis warmoSobis dRisaTvis. 


i/m `.....~ dRg-iT dasabegri sadavo 


operaciebi ganxorcielebuli hqonda 


2002-2004 wlebSi da aRniSnulidan gamomdinare, am urTierTobaze unda 


45 


gavrcelebuliyo 2005 wlis 1 ianvramde moqmedi saqarTvelos 


sagadasaxado kodeqsi. 


saqalaqo sasamarTlom baTumis saga


dasaxado inspeqciis 2005 wlis 


18 agvistos weriliT dadgenilad miiCni

sakasacio wesiT imave safuZvlebiT

romelmac moiTxova gasaCivrebuli 


ganCinebis gauqmeba da axali 


gadawyvetilebiT sarCelis da


kmayofilebaze uaris Tqma.  


kasatoris ganmartebiT, saqarTve


loSi moqmedi kanonmdeblobidan 


gamomdinare, sagadasaxado organos 


mxridan ar iqna ganxorcielebuli 


dRg-s CaTvlebi sagadasaxado departamentis Sesabamisi werilis 


safuZvelze. saqarTvelos finans


Ta saministros sagadasaxado 


departamentis amgvari moqmedeba gamo


mdinareobda 2005 


wlis 1 ianvramde 


moqmedi saqarTvelos sagadasaxado ko


deqsis moTxovnebidan. xsenebuli 


kodeqsis me-6 muxlis Tanaxmad, 


saqarTveloSi moqmedebs saerTo-


saxelmwifoebrivi da adgilobrivi gada


saxadebi. damatebuli Rirebulebis 


gadasaxadi warmoadgens saerTo-sax


elmwifoebriv gadasaxads da igi 


gadaxdilad CaiTvleba, roca dRg-s 


Tanxa dasabegri op


eraciebis drois 


mixedviT, gadaxdilia saxelmwifo bi


ujetSi, rasac iTvaliswinebs am 


kodeqsis 114-e muxlis pirveli 


nawilis bolo abzaci. aRniSnuli 


moTxovnebi Sesrulebulad CaiTvleb


a mxolod im SemTxvevaSi, roca 


daculi iqneba is ZiriTadi princi


pi, romelic gamomdinareobs amave 


kodeqsis 114-e muxlis pirveli 


nawilis bolo abzacidan _ dRg-s 


CaTvlas daeqvemdebareba saqarTvelos 


biujetSi gadaxdili dRg-s Tanxa. 


kasatoris mtkicebiT, saapelacio


 sasamarTlom arasworad Seafasa 


saqmis garemoebebi, ar ga


moikvlia Sesabamisi mtkicebulebebi da daarRvia 


saproceso da materialur


i samarTlis normebi. 


 kasatoris mtkicebiT, saapelacio


 sasamarTlom ar miuTiTa, Tu 


romeli faqtobrivi garemoebebi daedo safuZvlad sadavo 


gadawyvetilebas, riTac pirveli in


stanciis sasamarTlom gamoricxa 


mosarCelis mier ganxorcielebuli operaciis CaTvlis gauqmebis 


safuZvlebi saqarTvelos sagadasaxa


do kodeqsis  118-e muxliTac. 


gansaxilvel operaciebTan mimarTeb


aSi unda dadgindes, sasaqonlo 


zednadebebi iyo Tu ara 


Sedgenili kanonmdeblob


is dacviT. amasTan, 


Sesabamisi xelSekrulebebis Seswav


lisas gasaTvaliswinebelia mxareTa 


mier garigebaSi dafiqsirebuli Sinaarsi realurad arsebobs an/da 


ganxorcielda Tu ara.  


55 


amasTan, kasatoris ganmartebiT,


 gasaTvaliswinebelia isic, rom 


saqarTvelos 1997 wlis sagadasaxa


do kodeqsis me-15 muxlis me-7 


nawili uSvebs iseT mdgomareobas


ac, rodesac sagadasaxado angariS-


faqtura SesaZlebelia gayalbdes, ke


rZod, moxdes misi gamowera e.w. 


usaqonlo da fiqtiur operaciebz


e, rac scildeba saqarTvelos 


sagadasaxado organoebis kompeten


cias, vinaidan angariS-faqturis 


gayalbeba iwvevs sisxlissamarTlebriv pasuxismgeblobas.

uli garemoebebi, saqarTvelos 


sagadasaxado kodeqsis 114-e, 115-e muxlebis da 118-e muxlis me-3

samarTlebriv safuZvlebs. aRniSn

gamoiyena, ris gamoc saqarTvelos ad


ministraciuli saproceso kodeqsis 


34-e muxlis me-3 nawilis Tanaxmad, 


sakasacio saCivari dasaSvebad unda 


iqnes miCneuli, vinaidan zemoxs


enebuli darRvevebi, saqarTvelos

e muxlis `e” qvepunqtisa da 393-e 


muxlis me-2 nawilis `a” qvepunqt


is mixedviT, sakasacio saCivris 


absoluturi safuZvlebia.

los biujetSi Tanxa gadaxdilad 


iTvleba, Tu is asaxvas hpovebs erovnuli bankis mier gaxsnil saxazino 


angariSze. winaaRmdeg SemTxvevaSi,

saqarTvelos sagadasaxa

saxado kanonmdeblobis mixedviT, 


dauSvebelia.

60 


lars, maT Soris: xelfasi _ 142,85 


lari, kveba _ 171,5 lari, jildo _

rom "sajaro samsaxuris Sesaxeb" 


saqarTvelos kanonis 37-e muxl


is pirveli punqtis Tanaxmad, 


mosamsaxures ufleba aqvs samsaxurSi miRebis dRidan, samsaxuridan 


gaTavisuflebis dRemde miiRos

nvelyofis departamentis ufrosis

 #3-11/5064 cnobiT. sasamarTlom 


gamoiyena "sajaro samsaxuris Sesaxeb"


 saqarTvelos kanonis 37-e muxlis 


I punqti. 


sasamarTlom ver gaiziara mopasuxis ganmarteba imasTan 


dakavSirebiT, rom sasarCelo moTxovna xandazmulia, radgan 


zemoTmiTiTebuli kanonis 


51-e muxlis pirveli pu


nqtis "b" qvepunqtis 


Tanaxmad, mosamsaxures aqvs uf


lebebi da garantiebi miiRos 


Tanamdebobrivi funqciebis Sesasruleblad saWiro organizaciul-


teqnikuri saSualebebi da


 pirobebi, xolo amave muxlis me-2 punqtis 


Tanaxmad, saqarTvelos kanonmdeblob


iT mosamsaxureTaTvis SeiZleba 


gaTvaliswinebuli iqnes sxva damatebi


Ti uflebebi da ga


rantiebi;  aseTi 


xasiaTis damatebiT uflebebi da gara


ntiebi samxedro mosamsaxureTaTvis 


mocemulia specialuri urTierTobis momwesrigebeli normebiT; kerZod, 


"samxedro mosamsaxuris statusis Se


saxeb" saqarTvelos kanonis me-4 


muxlis Sesabamisad.  


sasamarTlom gamoiyena imave kano


nis me-12 muxli da


 miuTiTa, rom 


samxedro mosamsaxure srul saxelmwifo kmayofaze imyofeba, amasTan 


samxedro mosamsaxures samsaxureobrivi movaleobis keTilsindisierad 


Sesrulebis, sanimuSo disciplini


sa da sabrZolo momzadebaSi 


warCinebuli maCveneblebisaTvis wlis


 ganmavlobaSi SeiZleba mieces 


fuladi jildo da/an materialuri daxm


areba. sasamarTlom CaTvala, rom 


aRniSnuli norma imperatiuli xasi


aTisaa, SromiTi gasamrjelos _ 


61 


xelfasis, fuladi jildos, materi


aluri daxmarebisa da sasursaTo 


ulufis gacemis valdeb


uleba saqarTvelos Ta


vdacvis saministros 


akisria kanonmdeblobis safuZvelze


, anu igi administraciuli organos 


kanonismieri valdebulebaa, ufro metic, samxedro mosamsaxures mxolod 


kanonmdeblobiT dadgenili norm


is farglebSi unda mieces 


zemoTmiTiTebuli danamatebi da am


 danamatebis gacema xorcieldeba 


biujetis kanoniT damtkicebuli asignebebis farglebSi. sasamarTlom 


miiCnia, rom es samarTlebrivi norma mosarCeles aniWebs SesaZleblobas, 


moiTxovos saxelmwifosgan miuRebeli 


SromiTi gasamrjelo _ xelfasi, 


fuladi jildo, materialuri daxmareb


a da sasursaTe ul


ufa, radgan am 


moTxovnis uflebis realizebis SesaZlebloba ar aris SezRuduli 


drois konkretuli periodiT. 


sasamarTlom miuTiTa, rom 


xandazmulobis samarTlebrivi 


instituti SemoRebulia kerZo samarTlis sakanonmdeblo aqtiT _ 


saqarTvelos samoqalaqo kodeqsiT 


da moqmedebs kerZo samarTlebrivi 


urTierTobebis sferoSi; mosarC


ele ki saqarTvelos Tavdacvis 


saministrosTan SromiT-samarTlebriv 


urTierTobaSi imyofeboda rogorc 


samxedro mosamsaxure da es ur


TierTobebi regulirdeba sajaro 


samarTlis sakanonmdeblo aqtebiT _ 


"samxedro mosamsaxuris statusis 


Sesaxeb" da "sajaro samsaxuris Sesa


xeb" saqarTvelos 


kanonebiT, agreTve 


"saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saminist


ros samxedro mosamsaxureTa da 


samoqalaqo pirTa socialuri dacvis


a da materialuri uzrunvelyofis 


Sesaxeb" saqarTvelos prezidentis


 2004 wlis 5 noembris #493 


brZanebulebiT da "samxedro samsaxuris gavlis Sesaxeb" debulebiT, 


romelic damtkicebulia saqarTvelo


s prezidentis 1998 wlis 26 


oqtombris #609 brZanebulebis Sesa


bamisad. saqarTvelos samoqalaqo 


kodeqsis 129-e muxliT dadgenili 


samwliani xandazmulobis vadebi 


Seexeba xelSekrulebidan gamomdinare moTxovnebs; mosarCele r. a-sa da 


saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministros 


Soris dadebuli ar yofila raime 


saxis xelSekruleba, maT Soris urTierToba regulirdeba sajaro 


kanonmdeblobis safuZvelze gamocemu


li individualuri administraciul-


samarTlebrivi aqtebis _ 


brZanebis meSveobiT. 


sasamarTlom aseve ver gaiziara mo


pasuxis argumenti imis Taobaze, 


rom mosarCelis mier sarCeli xelfasis moTxovnis nawilSi wardgenili 


unda yofiliyo "sajaro samsaxuris 


Sesaxeb" saqarTvelos kanonis 127.1 


muxliT dadgenil vadaSi, im dRidan rodesac is gaTavisuflda 


samsaxuridan, e.i. gaTavisuflebidan


 erTi Tvis vadaSi. sasamarTlom 


ganmarta, rom aRniSnuli kanoniT mo


wesrigebulia sajaro samsaxuris 


62 


ganxorcielebasTan dakavSirebul


i urTierTobebi, mosamsaxuris 


samarTlebrivi mdgomareob


a, swored am kanonis 37-e muxliT daekisra 


administraciul organos valdebul


eba gasces SromiTi gasamrjelo 


mosamsaxureze, raTa Sesrulebuli sa


muSaosaTvis miiRos anazRaureba, 


swored amave muxlis me-4 punqti


s Sesabamisad ganisazRvra, rom 


mosamsaxureTa SromiTi gasamrjelos 


(xelfasis) fondis formirebis 


wyaroa Sesabamisi biujeti da sa


biujeto asignebaTa Semcireba ar 


SeiZleba iyos mosamsaxureTa Sr


omiTi gasamrjelos dafinansebis 


Semcirebis safuZveli. 


saqalaqo sasamarTlom aRniSna,


 rom 2006 wlis 29 dekembers 


miRebul iqna saqarTvelos kanoni "s


aqarTvelos 2007 wlis saxelmwifo 


biujetis Sesaxeb", romlis me-9 mu


xlis Tanaxmad, saxelmwifo aseve 


aRiarebs wina wlebSi warmoqmnil faqtobriv davalianebebs da 


saxelmwifo biujetis dafinanseb


aze myof dawese


bulebebsa da 


organizaciebs SesaZlebloba miecaT fi


nansTa saministrosTan SeTanxmebiT 


gamoiyenon xarjebis ek


onomikuri klasifikaciis Sesabamisi muxliT 


damtkicebuli asignebebi arsebuli davalianebebis dasafaravad. 


sasamarTlom CaTvala, rom mopasuxe 


administraciuli organos mxridan, 


romelic warmoadgens saxelmwifo biujetis dafinansebaze myof 


dawesebulebas da romlisTvisac ka


rgadaa cnobili da Sesabamisad 


dadasturebuli mosarCelis mimarT 


arsebuli saxelfaso davalianebis 


arseboba, mis anazRaurebaze uari


 arsebuli saxelmwifo politikis 


sawinaaRmdego da Sesaba


misad kanonSeusabamoa. 


amasTan sasamarTlom ganmarta


, rom mosarCelis moTxovna 


xandazmuladac rom iqnes miCneuli, mo


pasuxis mier gacemuli 2007 wlis 


23 ivlisis cnobiT aRiarebulia da


valianeba mosarCelis mimarT, rac 


saqarTvelos samoqala


qo kodeqsis 137-e muxlis Sesabamisad 


xandazmulobis vadis Se


wyvetis safuZvelia.  


sasamarTlom gamoiyena saqarTve


los administraciuli saproceso 


kodeqsis 33


1


-e muxli, romlis Tanaxmad Tu administraciuli organos 


mier raime moqmedebis ganxorciel


eba, an uari raime moqmedebis 


ganxorcielebaze ukanonoa da is pi


rdapir da uSualo (individualur) 


zians ayenebs mosarCelis kanonier uf


lebas an interess, sasamarTlo am 


kodeqsis 24-e muxlSi aRniSnul 


sarCelTan dakavSirebiT gamoitans 


gadawyvetilebas, romliTac ad


ministraciul organos avalebs 


ganaxorcielos es moqmedeba an Tavi Seikavos am moqmedebis 


ganxorcielebisagan.

     pirveli instanc

io sasamarTlos unda emsjela 


saqmeSi arsebuli mtkicebulebebis da

 jarTis SeZenis Sesaxeb Sedgenili 


dokumentebi arasworad gaaforma; xsenebuli dokumentebi eqspertizis 


daskvniT miCneulia e.w. finansuri aRricxvisaTvis sakmarisad, rac ver 


miiCneva sakmarisad saga


dasaxado aRricxvisaTvis, rameTu sagadasaxado 


valdebulebis warmoSobis, Secvlisa 


da Sewyvetis safuZveli, agreTve 


misi Sesrulebis wesi da pirobebi


 regulirdeba mxolod sagadasaxado

nmdeblobis sxva aqtebiT.   


kasators miaCnia, rom saapelac


io sasamarTlom sagadasaxado 


valdebulebis warmoSobis mizezebis 


da safuZvlebis Semowmebis gareSe 


gaauqma mosarCelis sagadasaxado


 valdebuleba, riTac daarRvia 


administraciul saproceso kodeqsis me

sasamarTlos samoqalaqo 


saproceso kodeqsis 103-e muxliT miniWebuli 


uflebamosilebis garda sakuTari in


iciativiTac unda Seegrovebina 


damatebiTi mtkicebulebebi, raTa 


daedgina sadavo administraciuli 


aqtebis kanoniereba.   


s a m o t i v a c i o    n a w i l i :  


sakasacio palata saqmis masalebis Seswavlis, sakasacio 


saCivrebis dasaSvebobis Semowmebis


 Sedegad miiCnevs, rom saqarTvelos 


finansTa saministros Semosavlebis 


samsaxuris quTaisis regionaluri 


centrisa (sagadasaxado inspeqcia) da


 saqarTvelos finansTa saministros 


Semosavlebis samsaxuris sakasa


cio saCivrebi ar akmayofilebs 


administraciuli saproceso kodeqsis 34-e muxlis me-3 nawilis 


moTxovnebs da ar aris dasaSvebi, Semdeg garemoebaTa gamo:  


administraciuli saproceso kodeqs


is 34-e muxlis me-3 nawili 


gansazRvravs sakasacio saCivris 


gansaxilvelad daSvebis amomwurav 


pirobebs, rogoricaa: a. saqme mniSvn


elovania samarTlis ganviTarebisa da 


erTgvarovani sasamarTlo praqtikis 


CamoyalibebisaTvis; b. saapelacio 


sasamarTlos gadawyvetileba gansxv


avdeba am kategoriis saqmeebze 


saqarTvelos uzenaesi sasamarTlos ma


namde arsebuli praqtikisagan; g.

nelovani saproceso 


darRveviT da arsebobs varaudi, ro


m mas SeeZlo arsebiTad emoqmeda 


saqmis ganxilvis Sedegze.

sakasacio sasamarTlo miiCnevs


, rom warmodgenili sakasacio 


saCivrebi ar aris dasaSvebi admini


straciuli saproceso kodeqsis 34-e 


muxlis me-3 nawiliT gaTvaliswinebuli arc erTi zemomiTiTebuli 


safuZvliT.  


kasatorebi ver asabuTeben saapel


acio sasamarTlos mier saqmis 


ganxilvas mniSvnelovani saproceso da


rRveviT, ramac arsebiTad imoqmeda 


saqmis ganxilvis Sedegze da ganapiroba araswori gadawyvetilebis 


gamotana.  


sakasacio saCivrebi ar aris


 dasaSvebi arc saapelacio 


sasamarTlos ganCinebis sa


kasacio sasamarTlos praq


tikisagan gansxvavebis 


arsebobis safuZvliT. saapelacio sa


samarTlos gasaCivrebuli ganCineba 


ar ewinaaRmdegeba am kategoriis


 davebze saqarTvelos uzenaesi 


sasamarTlos praqtikas.

 ganxilvisa da sakasacio 


sasamarTlos axali gadawyvetilebis mi

samarTlis ganviTarebisa da erTg


varovani sasamarTlo praqtikis

cnobas.

rantio furcliT momsaxurebaze, im 


motiviT, rom amgvari dafinanseba 


saqarTvelos socialuri dazRvevis 


erTiani saxelmwifo fondis funqcieb


Si aRar Sedioda da operaciis 


Rirebulebac gazrdili iyo. 2005 wlis 10 ivniss m. g-i, janmrTelobis 


mdgomareobis gauaresebis gamo, iZulebuli gaxda sakuTari xarjebiT 


gaekeTebina operacia. 


mosarCelis ganmartebiT, is garemoeba, rom obieqturi mizezebis 


gamo, misTvis operaciis gakeTeba imav


e wels ver moxerxda, ar niSnavda 


imas, rom mopasuxe saerTod gaTavisu


flda aRniSnuli valdebulebisagan.

 saapelacio sasamarT


lom ganmarta, rom `saaR


srulebo warmoebaTa 


Sesaxeb~ saqarTvelos kanonis 24-e


 muxlis Tanaxm


ad, saaRsrulebo 


furceli SeiZleboda gacemuliyo gadawyvetilebaSi dasaxelebuli 


kreditoris uflebamonacvle pirTa sasargeblod an movalis 


uflebamonacvle pirTa sawinaaRmdegod, Tu uflebamonacvleoba naTeli 


iyo, an amis damadasturebeli dokumenti Seadgina saTanadod 


uflebamosilma organom, an daamowma notariusma. Tu saWiro 


dadastureba ver xerxdeboda saTana


dod uflebamosili organos mier 


Sedgenili an notariusis mier damo


wmebuli dokumentebis saSualebiT, 


maSin kreditors an mis uflebamona


cvle pirs  sarCeli saaRsrulebo 


furclis gacemis Taobaze unda Se


etana gadawyvetilebis gamomtan 


sasamarTloSi.

o saqarTvelos socialuri dazRvevis 


erTiani saxelmwifo fondi, romelmac, Tavis mxriv, uari ganacxada 


saapelacio saCivarze. amdenad, „saaRsrulebo warmoebaTa Sesaxeb“

uflebamonacvleoba. aRniSnulis da


madasturebeli dokumenti Sedgenili 


iyo saTanadod uflebamosili organos 


mier da kreditoris sasargeblod

cemuliyo movalis _ saqarTvelos

cialuri dacvis saministros

e muxlis me-3 nawilis Sesabamisad 


ver warmoadgina imis damadastureb


eli mtkicebuleba, rom man kanoniT

ebis gawevis mizniT, saqarTvelos 


socialuri dazRvevis erTiani sa

005 wels Secvlili (gadidebuli)

daxmarebis gaweva warmoadgenda

rTelobisa da socialuri dacvis 


saministros ganzraxi an uxeSi gaufrTxileblobis Sedegs. Sesabamisad, 


mosarCelis moTxovna valdebulebis Seusruleblobis gamo, m. g-is 


87 


qirurgiuli operaciisaTvis gaRebuli 


Tanxis mopasuxisaTvis dakisrebis 


Taobaze, moklebuli iyo faqtobriv 


da samarTlebriv garemoebebs. 


zemoaRniSnulidan gamomdinare, saapelacio sasamarTlom miiCnia, 


rom gasaCivrebuli gadawyvetileba 


iuridiulad ar iyo sakmarisad 


dasabuTebuli da saqarTvelos samo


qalaqo saproceso kodeqsis 394-e 


muxlis „e“ qvepunqtis Sesabamisad,


 eqvemdebareboda gauqmebas. imave 


kodeqsis 385-e muxlis me-2 na


wilis Tanaxmad ki, saapelacio 


sasamarTlos SeeZlo, ar 


gadaegzavna saqme ukan da TviTon gadaewyvita 


igi.    


Tbilisis saapelacio sasama


rTlos administraciul saqmeTa 


palatis 2008 wlis 26 Tebervlis ga


dawyvetileba m. g-ma sakasacio 


wesiT gaasaCivra. kasatorma gasaCivr


ebuli gadawyvetilebis gauqmeba da 


axali gadawyvetilebiT sarCelis 


dakmayofileba moiTxova.    


kasatori aRniSnavs, rom gasaCi


vrebuli gadawyvetileba kanonis 


darRveviTaa gamotanili, saapelacio 


sasamarTlom ar gamoiyena kanoni, 


romelic unda gamoeye


nebina, gamoiyena kano


ni, romelic ar unda 


gamoeyenebina da araswo


rad ganmarta igi.

elacio sasamarTlom saqalaqo 


sasamarTlos gadawyvetilebis ga


uqmebis safuZvlad miuTiTa im 


garemoebaze, rom Tbilisis vake-s


aburTalos raionuli sasamarTlos 


2002 wlis 1 oqtombris gadawyvetilebas ar SeiZleboda hqonoda 


preiudiciuli Zala, vinaidan Tbil


isis vake-saburTalos raionuli

dasaxelebuli saqarTvelos Sromis, janmrTelobisa da socialuri 


dacvis saministro saapelacio warm


oebis Sewyvetis momentisaTvis aRar 


warmoadgenda mopasuxes, aramed im


 periodisaTvis sa

i dazRvevis erTiani saxelmwifo 


fondi. kasatoris mtkicebiT, mo


cemul SemTxvevaSi saapelacio 


sasamarTlo valdebuli iyo daed


gina, rom sarCeli aRZruli iyo 


arasaTanado mopasuxis winaaRmdeg da saqarTvelos Sromis,

is saministros mmarTvelobis 


sferoSi Semavali saxelmwifo 


saqveuwyebo dawesebuleba _

ramebis saagento Caeba saqmeSi

sarCelo gancxadebiT mimarTa goris 


raionul sasamarTlos mopasuxe go


ris regionaluri sagadasaxado 


inspeqciis mimarT. 


mosarCelis ganmartebiT, 2003


 wlis 8 agvistos saqarTvelos 


saxelmwifo uSiSroebis saministros Sida qarTlis regionaluri 


sammarTvelos ufrosma gamosca gadaud


ebeli aucileblobis SemTxvevaSi 


amoRebis Catarebis Sesaxeb dadgenileba, romelSic aRniSnuli iyo, rom 


daba agaraSi, Tbilisi-senakis 


106-e kilometrze dafiqsirda 


araregistrirebeli sawvavis

bobis, didi odenobiT

uqtebis Casxmisa da realizaciis 


faqti. Sedga gadaudebeli Cxrekis oqmi


c. mosarCelisaTvis gaugebari iyo,

 adgenda uSiSroebis samsaxuris 


warmomadgeneli, sawvavi qveyanaSi a

uricxavi. aseTi

ram mxolod misi sazRvarze gadm

dadgeniliyo, mosarCeles ki sazRvarze benzini ar gadautania, xolo rac

gaaCnda da Tu am benzinis gayidvas daapirebda,

 gamo, rom benzinis odenoba 8066 


litrs Seadgenda, xsenebuli oqmis Se


mdgenlebi varaudobdnen, rom misi 


gayidvis faqti iyo saxeze, Tumca kano


ni ar zRudavda moqalaqes Sesanaxi 


sawvavis raodenobis TvalsazrisiT, 


xolo mosarCeles benzini sruliad 


dausabuTeblad CamoarTves da gaugebari iyo, Tu sad waiRes igi.

romelma organom sad waiRo. SemdgomSi aRniSnuli masalebi _ 


dadgenileba da oqmi gadaegzavna saga


dasaxado inspeqcias, romelmac 2003 


wlis 23 dekembers mosarCele sruliad ukanonod daajarima.

nonis dacviT, aravis ucnobebia 


aRniSnuli gadawyvetilebis Taobaze.

mis mimarT gamocemuli dajarimebis aq

benzinis dabruneba, aseve _ sasa


marTlo xarjebis mopasuxisTvis 


dakisreba.

s 2004 wlis 6 Tebervlis 


gadawyvetilebiT i. n-is sarCeli ar


 dakmayofilda usafuZvlobis gamo.

wlis 26 Tebervlidan registrirebuli

miniWebuli hqonda saidentifika

noba ganexorcielebina kanoniT 


dadgenili wesiT, magram mosarCele is


e eweoda samewarmeo saqmianobas, 


rom ar gaaCnda sabuRalt


ro dokumentebi da ar axdenda saxelmwifo 


biujetTan angariSsworebas, xolo sa


samarTlo sxdomaze ver warmoadgina 


raime dokumentacia sadavo benzinis 


warmomavlobasa da aRricxvianobasTan 


dakavSirebiT. warmodgenili mtki


cebulebebiT dasturdeboda, rom 


mopasuxis qmedeba Seesabameboda sa


qarTvelos moqmedi sagadasaxado

ministraciuli samarTlisa da 


sagadasaxado saqmeTa saapelacio 


palatis 2004 wlis 14 dekembris 


ganCinebiT i. n-is saapelacio saCiva


ri ar dakmayofilda;


 ucvlelad darCa 


goris raionuli sasamarTlos 2004 wl


is 6 Tebervlis gadawyvetileba.  


saapelacio sasamarTlom gaiziara 


raionuli sasamarTlos mosazreba 


imis Taobaze, rom saqmis masalebi


dan gamomdinare, ar dasturdeboda 


mosarCelisaTvis pasuxismgeblobis 


dakisrebis pirobebis ararseboba, 


kerZod, saqmis masalebiT dadgenili 


iyo, rom 2003 wlis 8 agvistos 


saqarTvelos saxelmwifo uSiSroeb


is saministros Sida qarTlis 


regionaluri sammarTvelos TanamS


romlebis mier Tbilisi-senaki-


leseliZis saavtomobilo gzis 108-e km


-ze, daba agaraSi amoRebul iqna 


mosarCele i. n-is kuTvnili 8966 


litri benzini. qarelis raionuli 


sasamarTlos 2003 wlis 9 agvistos 


dadgenilebiT aRniSnuli benzinis 


amoReba kanonierad iqna cnobili. 


dadgenili iyo, rom didi odenobiT 


aRuricxavi sawvavis Casxmisa da re


alizaciis faqtze masalebi i. n-is 


mimarT, saqarTvelos saxelmwifo uSiS


roebis saministrodan gadaegzavna 


goris saolqo sagadasaxado inspeq


cias, romelmac 2003 wlis 27 


oqtombris aqtiT i. n-e saxelmwifo 


biujetis sasargeblod daajarima 


6276 lariT, saqarTvelos sagadasaxa


do kodeqsis 223-e, 235-e, 238-e, 


236-e da saqarTvelos zogadi administ


raciuli kodeqsis 51-53-e, me-100 


muxlebis safuZvelze. saqmis masalebiT aseve dadgenili iyo, rom 


mosarCele i. n-e 2003 wlis Te


bervlidan registrirebuli iyo 


individualur mewarmed, Sesabamisad,


 gadasaxadis gadamxdelad, romlis 


saqmianobis sagans Seadgenda sawvav


iT vaWroba. amasTan, gadasaxadis 


gadamxdelis saregistracio formaS


i apelantis mier pirdapir iyo 


miTiTebuli, rom naqiravebi hqonda benzingasamarTi sadguri, sadac 


110 


eweoda sawvavis Sesyidva-realizacias


. saapelacio sasamarTloSi saqmis 


ganxilvisas apelantma ga


nmarta, rom mas amoRebul


i benzini sWirdeboda 


momavalSi realizaciis mizniT, vinaidan apirebda avtogasamarTi sadguris

saapelacio sasamarTlom miuTiT


a, rom saqalaqo sasamarTlom 


sworad daadgina saqmis faqtobrivi 


garemoebani da swori samarTlebrivi 


Sefaseba misca maT. amdenad, saqarT


velos samoqalaqo sa


proceso kodeqsis 


390-e muxlis me-2 nawilis ,,g” qv


epunqtis Sesabamisad, saapelacio 


sasamarTlom srulad gaiziara saqa


laqo sasamarTlos Sefasebebi da 


daskvnebi saqmis faqtobriv da sama


rTlebriv sakiTxebTan dakavSirebiT.

 sasarCelo gancxadebiT mimarTa

 saaRsrulebo

is 12 agvistos q. Tbilisis 


saaRsrulebo biuroSi Catarda ganmeorebiTi iZulebiTi auqcioni,

binis, ricxuli mosarCele l. S-as saxelze, mesakuTre gaxda d. c-e.

rRvevebiT. aRniSnul binaze l. S-


iam da m. n-em gaaformes ipoTekis


 xelSekruleba, romlis mixedviTac, 


mosarCelem isesxa misgan 4340 aSS 


dolari TveSi or procentad, sami 


Tvis vadiT, xolo Semdeg 2500 dolari gadauxada mas. amis Semdgom 


mopasuxe m. n-em aRuTqva mosarCeles, rom adrovebda nasesxebi Tanxis

ukve kategoriulad moiTxova Tavisi 


kuTvnili Tanxis dabruneba. mosarCel


em isev sTxova 


m. n-es, rom igi

a valis gastumreba, m. n-em ki 


135 


sasamarTloSi Seitana sarCeli. im pe


riodSi, anu 2004 wlis maisisTvis 


mosarCeles ganuviTarda 


mwvave kataraqta da faqtobrivad, dakarga 


mxedveloba, amasTanave, igi iyo ma


rtoxela, II jgufis invalidi, 


pensioneri da im periodSi imyofeboda marto. 2004 wlis oqtomberSi 


mosarCelem, ise, rom ar icoda ra


ze awerda xels, xeli moawera 


auqcionis  Catarebis Setyobinebaze, ro


melzedac unda gaeyidaT misi bina, 


razec igi, rom scodnoda raze awerda


 xels, ar daTanxmdeboda. 2004  


wlis noemberSi l. S-as gaukeTes Tvalis operacia. mxareebi morigdnen, 


rom auqcionis Sedegebs m. n-e gaauqmebda mas Semdeg, rac mosarCele 


gaistumrebda mis vals. 2004 wlis 4 


dekembers mosarCelem mopasuxe m. 


n-es gadasca darCenili Tanxa, rac 


mopasuxem  daadastura xelweriliT, 


magram imis magivrad, rom masac 


Seesrulebina Tavisi piroba da 


gaeuqmebina auqcionis Sedegebi, damatebiT moiTxova xuTi aTasi dolari, 


razedac mosarCele ar daTanxmda.  


amdenad, mosarCelem araferi icoda 


auqcionTan dakavSirebiT, radgan 


aravin hyavda iseTi, romelic 


miuTiTebda, Tu raze awerda realur


ad xels, anu faqtobrivad, dairRva 


saqarTvelos samoqalaqo saproceso ko


deqsis 70-e da 72-e muxlebis 


pirveli nawilebi da „saaRsrulebo 


warmoebaTa Sesaxeb“ saqarTvelos 


kanonis 31-e muxlis pirveli punqti

#01/15-242 saaRsrulebo gankargule


bis baTilad cnobasa da 500 laris 


odenobiT advokatis momsaxureb


is xarjis anazRaurebaze.  


saqalaqo sasamarTlom mis mier


 gamoTxovili #01/04-01-82-44 


saaRsrulebo warmoebis saqmis masale


biT dadasturebulad miiCnia, rom 


2004 wlis 30 aprilis gadawyvetile


biT mosarCele l. S-as m. n-is 


sasargeblod daekisra 6553 aS

gadawyvetilebis iZulebiTi aRsruleb


is mizniT, m. n-em gancxadebiT 


mimarTa saaRsrulebo biuros da waru


dgina saaRsrulebo furceli. 2004 


wlis 31 maiss aRmasruleb


el i. m-is mier mosarCele gafrTxilebul iqna

aze, winaaRmdeg SemTxvevaSi _ 


mosalodneli iZulebiTi 


auqcionis Sesaxeb.  aRmasruleblis mier, 


kreditor m. n-is gancxadebis sa


fuZvelze, 2004 wlis 15 ivnisis 


gankargulebiT dainiSna iZulebiTi auqc


ioni l. S-as saxelze ricxul, q.

ica #01/15-241 gankarguleba.  


saqalaqo sasamarTlom miuTiTa saqarTvelos zogadi 


administraciuli kodeqsis me-60


1


 muxlis pirvel na


wilze da aRniSna, 


rom sarCeli aRZruli iyo sa


aRsrulebo gankargulebis _ 


administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqtis baTilad cnobis moTxovniT. 


saqalaqo sasamarTlom miiCnia, rom mocemul SemTxvevaSi, 


saaRsrulebo gankarguleba gamocemuli 


iyo kanonis Sesabamisad. saqalaqo 


sasamarTlom ar gaiziara mosa


rCele mxaris pozicia imasTan 


dakavSirebiT, rom darRveuli iyo „s


aaRsrulebo warmoebaTa Sesaxeb“ 


saqarTvelos kanonis 69-e muxli, ro


mlis Sesabamisadac, sasamarTlo 


aRmasrulebels SeeZlo gaeca gankargu


leba iZulebiTi auqcionis Sesaxeb, 


Tu movale registrirebuli iyo, ro


gorc uZravi qonebis mesakuTre. 


saqmis masalebiT, marTalia, dadgenil


i iyo, rom movale _ mosarCele l. 


S-a registrirebuli iyo, rogorc uZ


ravi nivTis mesakuTre, magram 


saqalaqo sasamarTlom miuTiTa xseneb


ul muxlze da ga


iziara mopasuxe 


mxaris miTiTeba imasTan dakavSirebiT, rom sasamarTlo aRmasruleblis 


mier meore iZulebiTi auqcionis Sesa


xeb gankargulebis 


gaucemloba ar 


SeiZleboda gamxdariyo auqcionis Sedegebis baTilad cnobis safuZveli.  


saqalaqo sasamarTlom ganmarta, rom 


„saaRsrulebo warmoebaTa Sesaxeb“ 


saqarTvelos kanonis 69-e muxlis


 dispoziciidan gamomdinareobda 


sasamarTlo aRmasruleblis diskre


ciuli uflebamosileba da ara 


valdebuleba iZulebiTi auqcionis 


Sesaxeb gankargulebis gacemis 


Taobaze. 


 amdenad, saqalaqo sasamarT


lom miiCnia, rom sasamarTlo 


aRmasrulebels kanoni ar avaldebule


bda, gamoeca iZul


ebiTi auqcionis 


daniSvnis Sesaxeb gankarguleba. ma


rTalia, sasamarTlo aRmasruleblis 


mier pirveli auqcionis Sesaxeb gaica gankarguleba, Tumca aRniSnuli ar 


warmoadgenda imis safuZvels, rom aRmasrulebels ganmeorebiTi  


auqcionis daniSvnis Taobazec imave 


wesiT unda emoqmeda da gamoeca 


meore iZulebiTi auqcioni


s Sesaxeb gankarguleba. 


saqalaqo sasamarTlom ar gaizia


ra mosarCelis miTiTeba imis 


Taobaze, rom auqcionis Catarebi


s Sedegad dairRva „saaRsrulebo 


warmoebaTa Sesaxeb“ saqarTvelos ka


nonis 31-e muxlis pirveli punqti, 


mosarCelis avadmyofobis, umweo mdgomareobaSi yofnis gamo, radgan 


sasamarTlo aRmasrulebels ufleba ar


 hqonda, am safuZvliT SeeCerebina 


139 


iZulebiTi aRsruleba, vinaidan xsenebuli muxliT gaTvaliswinebul 


SemTxvevebSi, mxolod sasamarT


lo iyo uflebamosili, movalis 


gancxadebis safuZvelze, mTlianad an 


nawilobriv gaeuqmebina aRsrulebis 


RonisZieba, aekrZala an droebiT SeeC


erebina esa Tu is RonisZieba, ara 


umetes ori Tvis vadiT. sasamarTlo


s mier ki zemoaRniSnul SesaZlo 


RonisZiebaTagan arc erTi ar yofila gamoyenebuli, imdenad, ramdenadac 


mosarCeles (movale l. S-as


) ar miumarTavs misTvis.

a saqarTvelos administraciuli

rCelis dakmayofileba.

Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqmeTa kolegiis 2006 wlis 10 oqtombris 


gadawyvetileba.  


saapelacio sasamarTlom 


miiCnia, rom gansaxil


vel SemTxvevaSi, l. 


S-as saapelacio saCivarSi miTiTebu


li garemoebebi ar warmoadgenda 


gasaCivrebuli gadawyvetilebis ga


uqmebis saqarTvelos samoqalaqo 


saproceso kodeqsis 393-394-e muxlebiT gaTvaliswinebul 


procesualur-samarTlebriv safuZvle


bs. saqalaqo sasamarTlom saqme 


ganixila arsebiTi xasiaTis saproc


eso darRvevebis gareSe, amasTan, 


sworad daadgina saqmis faqtobrivi 


garemoebebi da swori samarTlebrivi 


Sefaseba misca maT. Sesabamisad, 


saapelacio sasamarTlo daeTanxma 


pirveli instanciis sasamarTlos Sefasebebsa da daskvnebs saqmis 


faqtobriv da samarTlebriv sakiTxebTa


n dakavSirebiT da miuTiTa maTze. 


Tbilisis saapelacio sasamarTlos administraciul saqmeTa 


palatis  2008 wlis 23 aprilis ganC


ineba sakasacio wesiT gaasaCivra l. 


140 


S-am, romelmac moiTxova gasaCivrebul


i ganCinebis gauq


meba da saqmis 


xelaxla gansaxilvelad imave 


sasamarTlosTvis dabruneba. 


kasatoris ganmartebiT, saapel


acio sasamarTlom daarRvia 


saproceso normebi, kerZod, saqarTve


los samoqalaqo saproceso kodeqsis 


377-e muxlis me-3 nawili, romlis 


Tanaxmad, saapelacio sasamarTlo 


amowmebs gadawyvetilebas saapelacio saCivris farglebSi faqtobrivi da 


samarTlebrivi TvalsazrisiT. saap


elacio sasamarTlom arasrulad 


Seamowma saapelacio saCivari faqt


obrivi TvalsazrisiT da aqedan 


gamomdinare, ar gaiziara l. S-as 


mosazrebebi imasTan dakavSirebiT, rom 


mosarCele l. S-ia saqmis warmoebis 


periodSi iyo martoxela, usinaTlo, 


umweo mdgomareobaSi, mas ar hqonda


 araviTari saSualeba, adekvaturad 


moexdina reagireba saqmesTan dakavS


irebul mimdinare procesebze, aseve 


darRveuli iyo misi, rogorc mxar


is ufleba, mieRo Sesabamisi 


iuridiuli daxmareba, agreTve, darRveuli iyo administraciul-


samarTlebrivi aqtis momzadebis kano


nmdeblobiT dadgenili moTxovnebi, 


radgan igi aqtiurad ar yofila gafr


Txilebuli. am garemoebebis gamo, 


saapelacio sasamarTlom miiRo araswori ganCineba.  


saqarTvelos uzenaesi sasamar


Tlos administraciul da sxva 


kategoriis saqmeTa palatis 2008


 wlis 14 ivlisis ganCinebiT, 


saqarTvelos administraciuli saproc


eso kodeqsis 34-e muxlis me-3 


nawilis Sesabamisad, dasaSvebobis


 Sesamowmeblad warmoebaSi iqna 


miRebuli l. S-as sakasacio saCiva


ri; mxareebs miecaT ufleba, 2008 


wlis 14 ivlisis ganCinebis Cabarebi


dan 14 dRis vadaSi warmoedginaT 


mosazreba, Tu ramdenad iyo dasaSveb


i gansaxilvelad sakasacio saCivari 


saqarTvelos administraciuli saproces


o kodeqsis  34-e muxlis me-3 


nawilis mixedviT; saqarTvelos admi


nistraciuli saproceso kodeqsis 


34-e muxlis me-3 nawiliT gaTvalis


winebuli dasaSvebobis Semowmeba 


ganisazRvra 2008 wlis 2 oqtombramde.

o   n a w i l i : 


sakasacio sasamarTlo saqmis Se


swavlis, sakasacio saCivris 


dasaSvebobis Semowmebis Sedegad miiCne


vs, rom l. S-as sakasacio saCivari 


ar akmayofilebs saqarT


velos administraciuli saproceso kodeqsis 34-e 


muxlis me-3 nawilis moTxovnebs da 


ar eqvemdebareba dasaSvebad cnobas 


Semdeg garemoebaTa gamo:  


141

biT sarCelis dakmayofileba.

uli gadawyvetileba gamotanilia

gadawyvetilebis gamotana gamoiw

gaSvebul iqna.

rTlo praqtikis CamoyalibebisaTvis; 


b) saapelacio sasamarTlos gadawyveti


leba gansxvavdeba am kategoriis 


saqmeebze saqarTvelos uzenaesi 


sasamarTlos manamde arsebuli 


praqtikisagan; g) saapelacio sa


samarTlos mier sa


qme ganxilulia 


mniSvnelovani saproceso darRveviT 


da arsebobs varaudi, rom mas 


SeeZlo arsebiTad emoqmeda saqmis ganxilvis Sedegze.

a R w e r i l o b i T i   n a w i l i: 


2007 wlis 10 maiss v. m-ma


 sasarCelo gancxadebiT mimarTa 


Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos administraciul saqmeTa kolegias 


mopasuxe saqarTvelos finansTa saministros mimarT. 


mosarCelem aRniSna, rom saqarTvelos finansTa ministris pirveli 


moadgilis 2007 wlis 16 aprilis #p-723 brZanebiT gaTavisuflda 


saqarTvelos finansTa saministros 


Semosavlebis samsaxuris (sabaJo 


departamentis) .... sammarTvelos .... ganyofilebis ufrosis 


Tanamdebobidan. xsenebul brZane


baSi gaTavisuflebis safuZvlad 


miTiTebuli iyo `sajaro samsaxuris 


Sesaxeb” saqarTvelos kanonis 97-e 


muxlis pirveli punqti, maSin rode


sac, imave muxlis me-2 punqtis 


Tanaxmad, ar SeiZleboda moxele ga


Tavisuflebuliyo samsaxuridan Tu 


150 


igi Tanaxma iyo daniSnuliyo sxva Tanamdebobaze, rac mis SemTxvevaSi ar 


ganxorcielda.  


mosarCelis ganmartebiT, misi 


samsaxuridan gaTavisuflebisas 


darRveuli iyo `sajaro samsaxuris Se


saxeb~ saqarTvelos kanonis 96-e 


muxlis me-3 punqti. aseve darRveul


i iyo saqarTvelos Sromis kanonTa 


kodeqsis 36-e muxlis pirveli pu


nqti, romlis Tanaxmad, muSakTa 


ricxovnobis an Statebis Semcirebis


as samuSaoze darCenis upiratesi 


ufleba eniWebodaT im muSakebs, roml


ebic ufro maRali kvalifikaciiTa 


da Sromis nayofierebiT gamoirCeodnen


 da imave kanonis me-2 muxlis `g” 


qvepunqti, romelic iTvaliswinebda


 samuSaoze darCenis upirates 


uflebas im pirisaTvis, romelsac am sawarmoSi, dawesebulebaSi an 


organizaciaSi muSaobis ufro


 xangrZlivi staJi hqonda. 


mosarCelem aRniSna, rom saqarTve


los finansTa saministros mier 


darRveul iqna saqarTvelos zogadi


 administraciuli kodeqsis me-5 


muxli da 96-e muxlis me-2 nawili


, vinaidan admini


straciul organos 


ufleba ar hqonda  kanonmdeblob


is moTxovnaTa sawinaaRmdegod 


ganexorcielebina raime qmedeba, ma


T Soris, gamoeca individualuri 


administraciul-samarTlebrivi aqti 


saqmisaTvis arsebiTi mniSvnelobis 


mqone garemoebebis gamokvleva-Sefasebis gareSe. 


mosarCelis ganmartebiT,


 misi samsaxuridan gaTavisuflebis brZaneba 


miRebuli iyo saqmisaTvis arsebiTi mniSvnelobis mqone garemoebebis 


gamokvlevis gareSe da saqarTvelos Sromis kanonTa kodeqsis normaTa 


darRveviT. amdenad, gasaCivrebul


i brZaneba ukanono iyo, rac misi 


baTilad cnobis safuZvels warmoadgenda.  


sabolood, mosarCelem saqarTvelo


s finansTa ministris pirveli 


moadgilis 2007 wlis 16 aprilis 


#p-723 brZanebis baTilad cnoba, 


samuSaoze aRdgena da iZulebiTi ga


nacduri xelfasis anazRaureba, 


agreTve  gasuli wlebis saxelf


aso davalianebis _ 2000 laris 


anazRaureba moiTxova.

nebiT mocemul saqmeSi Tanamopasuxed 


saqarTvelos finansTa 


saministros Semosavleb


is samsaxuri Caeba.

xelfasisa da saxelfaso davalianeb


is anazRaureba moiTxova Tavad 


mopasuxeTa mier warmodgenil cnobebSi miTiTebuli odenobiT.

sagadasaxado Semowmebebis aqtebiT dgindeboda, rom sadavo sameurneo

wesebis dacviT gansaxorcielebel


 valdebulebebTan dakavSirebiT, 


aranairi darRveva ar gamovlenila.

marTlom ar gaiziara mopasuxis pozicia, rom,

gaiziara mosarCelis ganmarteba

moTxovnebi. saqalaqo sasamarTlom miiC

zogadi administraciuli kodeqsis 96

, deklaraciebi wardgenil iqna da Sps `.....”

da zedmetad gadaxdili Tanxebi da 


amdenad, daculi iyo sadavo sama


rTalurTierTobis warmoSobis dros 


moqmedi saqarTvelos sagadasaxado


 kodeqsis 114-115-e muxlebiT 


dadgenili moTxovnebi. 


aRniSnulidan gamomdinare, usafuZvlo iyo 


apelantis gancxadeba im


is Sesaxeb, rom am kodeqsis 114-e muxlis 


Sesabamisad, biujetSi ar iyo Cari


cxuli xsenebul angariS-faqturebSi 


asaxuli dRg-s Tanxebi.

gionaluri centris (sagadasaxado 


inspeqcia)  sakasacio saCivars da mi


aCnia, rom sakasacio saCivari unda 


darCes ganuxilveli Semdeg garemoebaTa gamo: 


sakasacio sasamarTlo aRni


Snavs, rom saqarTvelos 


administraciuli saproceso kodeqsis


 pirveli muxlis me-2 nawilis 


Tanaxmad, Tu am kodeqsiT sxva ram 


ar aris dadgenili, administraciul 


samarTalwarmoebaSi gamoiyeneba sa


qarTvelos samoqalaqo saproceso 


kodeqsis debulebani. 


sakasacio sasamarTlo miuTiT


ebs saqarTvelos samoqalaqo 


saproceso kodeqsis 396-e muxlze, romlis me-3 nawilis Tanaxmad, Tu 


sakasacio saCivari ar aris Setanili


 kanoniT dadgenil vadaSi, sakasacio 


saCivari ganuxilveli darCeba. 


saqarTvelos samoqalaqo saproc


eso kodeqsis 397-e muxlis 


pirveli nawilis Tanaxmad, sakasacio 


saCivris Setanis vadaa 1 Tve. am 


vadis gagrZeleba (aRdgena) ar SeiZ


leba da igi iwye


ba mxarisaTvis 


gadawyvetilebis gadacemis momentidan. 


sakasacio sasamarTlo miuTiTeb


s, rom saqarTvelos finansTa 


saministros Semosavlebis samsax


uris goris regionalur centrs 


(sagadasaxado inspeqcia) Tbil


isis saapelacio sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqmeTa palatis 2008


 wlis 23 ianvris gadawyvetilebis 


asli Cahbarda 2008 wlis 3 ivliss 


(s.f. 199), sakasacio saCivari ki 


saqarTvelos finansTa saministros 


Semosavlebis samsaxuris goris 


regionalurma centrma (sagadasaxado


 inspeqcia) saqarTvelos uzenaes 


sasamarTloSi fostis meSveobiT wara


dgina 2008 wlis 5 agvistos, anu 


saqarTvelos samoqalaqo saproceso 


kodeqsis 397-e muxlis pirvel 


nawilSi miTiTebuli erTTviani va


dis darRveviT, radgan xsenebuli 


gadawyvetilebis gasaCivrebis vada


 misTvis saqarTvelos samoqalaqo 


saproceso kodeqsis 61-e muxlis pirveli da me-3 nawilebis Tanaxmad 


2008 wlis 3 agvistos, ocdaoTx saaTze amoiwura. 


 aRniSnulidan gamomdinare, sakasacio sa


samarTlos

gadacemis Sesaxeb.

o      n a w i l i : 


 sakasacio sasamarTlo warmodgeni


li gancxadebis gacnobis Sedegad 


miiCnevs, rom aRniSnuli gancxadeba unda darCes ganuxilvelad 


dauSveblobis motiviT. 


saqarTvelos administraciuli saproceso kodeqsis pirveli muxlis 


me-2 nawilis Sesabamisad, TuU am kode


qsiT sxva ram ar aris dadgenili, 


administraciul samarTalwarmoebaSi 


gamoiyeneba saqarT


velos samoqalaqo 


saproceso kodeqsis debulebani. 


sakasacio sasamarTlo miuTiT


ebs saqarTvelos samoqalaqo 


saproceso kodeqsis 421-e muxlis pirv


el nawilze, romlis Sesabamisad, 


kanonier ZalaSi Sesuli gadawyveti


lebiT an ganCinebiT damTavrebuli 


saqmis warmoebis ganaxleba dasaSvebia


 mxolod maSin, rodesac arsebobs 


gadawyvetilebis baTilad cnobis (422-e muxli) an axlad aRmoCenil 


garemoebaTa gamo saqmis warmoebis 


ganaxlebis Sesaxeb (423-e muxli) 


gancxadebis wanamZRvrebi.  


sakasacio sasamarTlo 


ganmartavs, rom saqa


rTvelos samoqalaqo 


saproceso kodeqsis 421-e muxlis pirveli nawilis Tanaxmad, axlad 


aRmoCenil garemoebaTa ga


mo gadawyvetilebis (ganCinebis) gauqmebisa da 


saqmis warmoebis ganaxlebis Sesaxeb 


gancxadebis Setana daiSveba mxolod 


kanonier ZalaSi Sesul gadawyvetilebaze (ganCinebaze), anu damTavrebul 


saqmeze, xolo sakasacio sasama


rTlos mier sasamarTloTa Soris 


gansjadobis Sesaxeb miRebul ganCin


ebaze axlad aRmoCenil garemoebaTa 


gamo ganCinebis gauqmebisa da saqmis warmoebis ganaxlebis Sesaxeb 


gancxadebis Setana dauSvebelia, radgan gansjadobis Taobaze miRebuli 


ganCinebiT ganixileba da wydeba ara 


mxareTa, aramed sa


samarTloTa Soris 


dava, ganisazRvreba saqmis ganxilva


ze uflebamosili sasamarTlo da 


amdenad, ar mTavrdeba saqmis warmoeba.

    apelantebis

qturi gadawyvetilebis misaRebad,

mtkicebulebebi.

sakarmidamo terotoriidan 300 kv.m


 dauTmo Tavis Svils a. n-as 


sacxovrebeli saxlis asaSeneblad da 


mas darCa 600 kv.m. a. n-am 1961 


wels aaSena sacxovrebeli saxli g. n-as sakuTrebaSi da am ukanasknelis 


teritoriaze arsebuli kuxna saxlis 


gverdiT. am droisaTvis a. n-as 


sargeblobaSi gadacemuli hqonda mxol


od mamis mier daTmobili 300 kv.m 


miwis nakveTi. .... quCaze Cixis gake

rac aisaxa mis saxelze 


gacemul teqnikuri aRricxvis baraTSic. ninuebis 


ojaxebs hqondaT erTi saerTo mTavari

maT sxva misasvleli 


gza ar gaaCniaT.

dafiqsirebulia sadavo sakuTrebis mo

a mowinaaRmdege mxaris mosazrebas, 


rom warmodgenili werilis Tanaxm


ad, g. n-as nakveTi 989 kv.m 


dafiqsirebuli iyo 1965 wels da 1986 wlisaTvis Semcirda 600 kv.m-


mde. anu Tavdapirvelad ar flobda 989 kv.m-s da es odenoba 


daufiqsirda werilis Tanaxmad, 19


65 wels. sakasacio sasamarTlos 


miaCnia, rom amgvari daskvna ar ga


momdinareobs saqmeSi warmodgenili 


mtkicebulebidan, radgan ozurge


Tis saregistracio samsaxuris 


werilidan erTmniSvnelovnad ar dast


urdeba, rom nakveTis odenobis 989 


kv.m-dan 600 kv.m-mde Semcireba moxda 1986 wels. werilSi miTiTebulia 


mxolod nakveTis odenobis gadakeTebis faqtze, magram ra periodSi 


moxda aRniSnuli cvlileba, ar dgin


deba. werilis Tanaxmad, g. n-as 


saaRricxvo baraTSi Setanili monacemebi damtkicda 1986 wlis 17 


aprilis #86 gadawyvetilebiT.  


amdenad, sakasacio sasamarTlo


s miaCnia, rom saapelacio 


sasamarTlom unda gamoikvlios da 


mtkicebulebaTa urTierTSejerebis

enobis miwis nakveTi ekuTvnoda

i saqmeze daniSnos eqspertiza miwis 


nakveTebis zomebis dadgenis

     Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamar


Tlos administraciul saqmeTa kolegiis 


2007 wlis 10 dekembris gadawyvetile


biT S. a-as sarCeli dakmayofilda; 


saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministros 


S. a-as sasargeblod daekisra 


davalianebis _ 1587,53 laris anazRaureba. 


pirveli instanciis sasamarTlom 


gamoiyena ,,sajaro samsaxuris 


Sesaxeb” saqarTvelos kanoni


s me-4 da 37-e muxlebi. 


saqalaqo sasamarTlom ganmarta


, rom ar iziarebs mopasuxis 


mosazrebas sarCelis xandazmulobasT


an dakavSirebiT da miiCnia, rom 


mocemul davaze, rogorc kanonism


ier valdebulebaze, ar unda 


gavrceldes samoqalaqo kodeqsis 


129-e muxliT gaTvaliswinebuli 


xandazmulobis samwliani vada.  


pirveli instanciis sasamarTlos ga


dawyvetileba saapelacio wesiT 


gaasaCivra saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministrom.

los administraciul saqmeTa 


palatis 2008 wlis 30 aprilis ga


nCinebiT saqarTvelos Tavdacvis 


saministros saapelacio saCivari 


ar dakmayofilda; ucvlelad darCa 


Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos admi


nistraciul saqmeTa kolegiis 2007 


wlis 10 dekembris gadawyvetileba. 


saapelacio palatam ganmarta, 


rom gansaxilvel SemTxvevaSi 


saapelacio saCivarSi miTiTebuli ga


remoebebi ar qmnian samoqalaqo 


saproceso kodeqsis 393-e da 394-e muxlebiT gaTvaliswinebul, 


gasaCivrebuli gadawyvetilebis gauqmebis procesualur-samarTlebriv 


safuZvlebs.

saapelacio palata daeTanxma Tb

 miiCnia, rom gasaCivrebuli 


gadawyvetileba kanonieria da Sesa

saapelacio 


sa


samarTlos administraciul saqmeTa 


palatis 2008 wlis 30 aprilis ganC


inebaze sakasacio saCivari Seitana 


saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministro


m da moiTxova gasaCivrebuli 


ganCinebis gauqmeba da axali gadawy


vetilebiT sarCelis dakmayofilebaze 


uaris Tqma. sakasacio saCivari dasa


buTebulia imiT, rom mosarCele S. a-


am moiTxova saqarTvelos Tavdacvis 


saministrosTvis 1998-2001 wlebis 


saxelfaso Tanxis dakisreba; kasato


ri Tvlis, rom sasarCelo moTxovna 


xelfasis, jildos, kvebis kompensa


ciisa da materialuri daxmarebis 


moTxovnis nawilSi xandazmulia, radg


an amgvar moTxovnebze vrceldeba 


saqarTvelos samoqalaqo kodeqsis 


129-e muxliT dadgenili samwliani 


xandazmulobis vada, Tumca sasa


marTlos kanonis es norma ar 


gamouyenebia. "sajaro samsaxuris Se


saxeb" saqarTvelos kanonis me-14 


muxliT, saqarTvelos Sromis kanonm


debloba moxeleebsa da damxmare 


mosamsaxureebze vrceldeba am kanoniT gansazRvrul TaviseburebaTa 


gaTvaliswinebiT. sajaro samsaxurTa


n dakavSirebuli is urTierToba, rac 


am kanoniT ar wesrigde


ba, regulirdeba Sesabamisi kanonmdeblobiT. 


kasatori Tvlis, rom SromiTi urTier


Tobebis mowesrigebisas gamoiyeneba 


saqarTvelos samoqalaqo


 kodeqsis normebi. 


kasatori yuradRebas amaxvilebs


 im garemoebaze, rom "samxedro 


mosamsaxuris statusis Sesaxeb" 


saqarTvelos kanoni


s me-12 muxlis 


meoTxe punqtidan irkveva, "danamatis


" statusi miniWebuli aqvs mxolod 


fulad Tanxebs, romelic gaiangariSeb


a namsaxurebis wlebis mixedviT. 


rac Seexeba jildos, kvebis kompensa


cias da materialur daxmarebas, 


"samxedro mosamsaxuris statusis Se


saxeb" saqarTvelos kanonis me-12 


muxlis meore da mesame punqtebidan gamomdinare, "danamatis" statusi ar 


aqvs miniWebuli. amitom kasators miaC


nia, rom jildo, kvebis kompensacia 


da materialuri daxmareba ar warmoa


dgenen "sajaro samsaxuris Sesaxeb" 


saqarTvelos kanonis 37.1 muxliT 


gaTvaliswinebul xelfasSi Semaval 


danamatebs da isini xelfasisagan damoukidebel fulad gasacemels 


warmoadgens.

sakasacio sasamarTlo saqmis ma


salebis Seswavlis, sakasacio 


saCivris dasaSvebobis Semowmebis

ri S. a-is xelfasis, jildosa da 


materialuri daxmarebis anazRaur


ebis nawilSi ar akmayofilebs 


saqarTvelos administraciuli saproc


eso kodeqsis 34-e muxlis me-3 


nawilis moTxovnebs da ar eqvemdeb


areba dasaSvebad cnobas Semdeg 


garemoebaTa gamo:  


saqarTvelos administraciuli sapr


oceso kodeqsis 34-e muxlis  


me-3 nawili gansazRvravs sakasacio 


saCivris gansaxilvelad dasaSvebobis 


amomwurav safuZvlebs, rogoricaa: a.


 saqme mniSvnelovania samarTlis 


ganviTarebisa da erTgvarovani sasama


rTlo praqtikis CamoyalibebisaTvis; 


b. saapelacio sasamarTlo


s gadawyvetileba gansxvavdeba am kategoriis 


saqmeebze saqarTvelos uzenaesi 


sasamarTlos manamde arsebuli 


praqtikisagan; g. saapelacio sa


samarTlos mier saqme ganxilulia 


mniSvnelovani saproceso darRveviT 


da arsebobs varaudi, rom mas 


SeeZlo arsebiTad emoqmeda saqmis ganxilvis Sedegze.  


sakasacio sasamarTlo miiCnevs,


 rom warmodgenili sakasacio 


saCivari S. a-is xelfasis jildosa da materialuri daxmarebis 


anazRaurebis nawilSi ar aris dasaSvebi saqarTvelos administraciuli 


saproceso kodeqsis 34-e muxlis 


me-3 nawiliT gaTvaliswinebuli 


arcerTi zemoT miTiTebuli safuZvliT.  


kasatori ver asabuTebs saapelac


io sasamarTlos mier am nawilSi 


saqmis ganxilvas mniSvnelovani sa


proceso darRveviT, rac arsebiTad 


imoqmedebda saqmis ganxilvis Sedegz


e da ganapirobebda amave nawilSi 


araswori gadawyvetilebis miRebas.

208 


nawilSi ver aqarwylebs saapelacio sasamarTlos mier dadgenil 


faqtobriv garemoebebsa da daskvnebs.   


sakasacio saCivari dasaxelebul 


nawilSi ar aris dasaSvebi arc

damkvidrebuli praqtikisagan gans


xvavebis arsebobis safuZvliT.

ewinaaRmdegeba am kategoriis davebz


e saqarTvelos uzenaesi sasamarTlos 


manamde arsebul praqtikas.

isa da erTgvarovani sasamarTlo 


praqtikis Camoyalibebis aucileblobis TvalsazrisiT.

 wlis 30 aprilis ganCinebaze.

    n a w i l i :

a-em sasarCelo gancxadebiT mimarTa q.

ministros mimarT, davalianebis 


anazRaurebis Taobaze. 


    mosarCele sasarCelo gancxade


biT iTxovda mopasuxe saqarTvelos

saxelfaso davalianebis – 3 


989,75 laris anazRaureba.

obrivi garemoebebi

dasaSvebi da dasabuTebuli pretenzia.

praqtikis CamoyalibebisaTvis, saap


elacio sasamarTlos ganCineba ar 


gansxvavdeba am kategoriis saqmeebz


e saqarTvelos uzenaesi sasamarTlos 


manamde arsebuli praqtikisagan da


 saapelacio sasamarTlom saqme 


ganixila procesualuri darRvevis gareSe. 


      sakasacio sa


samarTlos miaCnia, rom mocemul SemTxvevaSi ar 


arsebobs saapelacio sasamarTlos 


mier gamoyenebuli saproceso da 


materialuri samarTlis normebis ganmartebisa da samarTlis 


ganviTarebis mizniT, sakasacio sasa


marTlos mier zogadi mniSvnelobis 


mqone (konkretulTan erTad) saxelmZRvanelosa da sarekomendacio 


gadawyvetilebis gamotanis faqtobrivi saWiroeba.

sasamarTlos 


mosazr

araviTari principuli mniSvneloba

rmatebis perspeqtiva.

mosamsaxures ufleba aqvs samsaxur

pirveli punqtis Tanaxmad, saqarTvelos 


Sromis kanonmdebloba moxeleebze


 vrceldeba aRniSnuli kanoniT 


gansazRvrul TaviseburebaTa gaTvalis


winebiT, xolo amave muxlis me-2 


punqtis Tanaxmad, sajaro


 samsaxurTan dakavSir


ebuli is urTierToba, 


rac aRniSnuli kanoniT ar wesrigdeba, regulirdeba Sesabamisi 


kanonmdeblobiT. saqarTvelos Sromis


 kanonTa kodeqsis 96-e muxlis 


Tanaxmad, mosamsaxures misi daTxov


nisas dawesebulebisagan kuTvnili 


mTeli Tanxa eZleva daTxovnis dRes.

muSaobda, maSin Sesabamisi Tanxa unda


 aunazRaurdes ara ugvianes Semdegi 


dRisa daTxovnili muSakis mier an


gariSsworebis Sesaxeb moTxovnis 


wardgenidan. aRniSnulidan gamomd


inare sasamarTlom ganmarta, rom 


mosarCeleebs saxelfaso davalianebis


 moTxovnis ufleba warmoeSvaT 


maSin, rodesac gaTavisufldnen samsaxuridan.

aSi warCinebuli maCveneblebisaTvis

-e muxlis me-3 nawili


s safuZvelze, ganexila 


mxaris dauswreblad. xolo rac Se


exeba kasatoris motivacias imis 


Taobaze, rom saqmis ganmxilveli 


mosamarTlisaTvis sxva saqmesTan 


dakavSirebiT cnobili iyo bankis axali misamarTi, sakasacio 


sasamarTlos mxridan gaziarebuli 


ver iqneba aRniSnuli mosazrebis 


Sesabamis saproceso normebze motivirebis SeuZleblobis gamo. 


imavdroulad sakasacio sasamarT


lo arsebiTad miiCnevs im 


garemoebas, rom sadavo qoneba, 


saapelacio sasamarTloSi davis 


gadawyvetis momentisaTvis, gasxvi


sebuli iyo, qoneba ganmeorebiT 


gasxvisda sakasacio sasama


rTloSi saqmis ganxilvis 


momentisaTvis, magram 


aRniSnul garemoebas sakasacio sasama


rTlo ver miiCnevs saqmis xelaxali 


243 


ganxilvisaTvis dabrunebis safuZvlad,


 vinaidan saapel


acio sasamarTlom 


saqme ganixila sarCelis farglebSi, 


misTvis cnobili ar yofila qonebis 


gasxvisebis faqti, mas saproceso 


normebi ar daurRvevia da rac 


arsebiTia, mocemul viTarebaSic ki, mosarCelis kanonier interess 


warmoadgens moaxdinos saregistraci


o samsaxurebis ukanono Canaweris 


baTiloba da damatebiTi samar


Tlebrivi berketebis meSveobiT 


uzrunvelyos sakuTari uflebebis realizeba.

Semdegi SemadgenlobiT: 


nugzar sxirtlaZe (Tavmjdomare, momxsenebeli),  


 mariam ciskaZe, levan murusiZe 


saqarTvelos administraciuli 


saproceso kodeqsis pirveli 


muxlisa da 34-e muxlis me-3 nawi


lis safuZvelze, zepiri ganxilvis 


gareSe, Seamowma saqarTvelos Tavdac


vis saministros sakasacio saCivris 


dasaSvebobis safuZvlebi.  


a R w e r i l o b i T 


i     n a w i l i : 


01.08.07w. Tbilisis saqalaqo sa


samarTlos administraciul saqmeTa 


kolegias saxelfaso davalianebisa 


da sanivTe qonebis kompensaciis 


anazRaurebis Sesaxeb sasarCelo gancxadebiT mimarTa o. p-ma. mosarCelem 


Semdeg Seamcira moTxovna da sabo


lood 1998-2000ww., 1908.33 laris 


saxelfaso davalianebis anazRaureba moiTxova. mosarCelem aRniSna, rom 


1991 wlis 1 maisidan 2006 wlis 20 aprilamde msaxurobda saqarTvelos 


SeiaraRebul ZalebSi, saidanac zRvrul


i asakis miRwevis gamo TadarigSi 


iqna daTxovili 20.04.06w. mopasuxes,


 araerTi moTxovnis miuxedavad,  ar 


aunazRaurebia misTvis 1998-2000ww. xelfasi.  


 Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqmeTa kolegiis 


11.09.07w. gadawyvetilebiT o. p-is 


sasarCelo gancxadeba dakmayofilda 


da saqarTvelos Tavdacvis samini


stros mosarCelis sasargeblod 


daekisra 1908.33 laris  saxelfas


o davalianebis anazRaureba.   


 Tbilisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos 


administraciul saqmeTa kolegiis 


11.09.07w. gadawyvetileba saapelac


io wesiT gaasaCivra saqarTvelos 


Tavdacvis saministrom. 


Tbilisis saapelacio sasama


rTlos administraciul saqmeTa 


palatis 20.11.07w. gadawyvetilebiT 


saqarTvelos Tavdacvis saministros 


saapelacio saCivari dakmayofilda 


nawilobriv, Tbilisis saqalaqo 


sasamarTlos administraciul sa


qmeTa kolegiis 11.09.07w. 


gadawyvetilebis SecvliT miRebul iqna axali gadawyvetileba, o. p-s 


uari eTqva 826 laris kvebis kompensaciis anazRaurebaze, danarCen 


252 


nawilSi gasaCivrebuli gadawyvetile


ba darCa ucvlelad. saapelacio 


palatam ar gaiziara sasamarTlo kole


giis samarTlebrivi Sefasebebi da 


daskvnebi im nawilSi, romliTac o. 


p-is sasarCelo moTxovna kvebis 


kompensaciis anazRaurebis Taob


aze dakmayofilda 


da saqarTvelos 


Tavdacvis saministros mosarCelis 


sasargeblod daekisra 826 laris 


anazRaureba. saapelacio palatis 


ganmartebiT, sasursaTo ulufiT 


uzrunvelyofa warmoadgens saqa


rTvelos Tavdacvis saministros 


periodulad Sesasrulebel valdebulebas da  mis moTxovnaze unda 


gavrcelebuliyo xandazmulobis 3 wliani vada. saapelacio palatis 


gancxadebiT, saqmis masalebSi da

x-ma sasarCelo gancxadebiT mimarTa 


quTaisis saqalaqo sasamarTlos, mo

anazRaurebis Taobaze.

sasargeblod dakisreboda materialur

    amasTan, saqarTvelos samoqalaqo kodeqsis 1328-e muxliT 


gansazRvrulia samkvidro qoneba, romelic Seicvas mamkvidreblis 


rogorc qonebrivi uflebebis (samkvi


dro aqtivi), iseve movaleobebis

momnetisTvis. samkvidroSi Sedis saerTo sakuTrebis wili, romelic

maSin – am qonebis Rirebuleba.

moraluri zianis anazRaureba.

 me-19 muxlis Sesabamisad, me-18 


muxlSi aRniSnuli uflebebi SeiZleba


 gamoiyenos im pirmac, romelic 


Tumca TviTon ar aris saxelis an pi


radi Rirsebis uflebis matarebeli,

 interesi. mas SeuZlia saxelisa da 


Rirsebis iseTi dacvis moTxovnis ganxorcieleba, romelic pirovnebis 


arsebis ganmsazRvrelia 


da grZeldeba sikvdilis Semdegac. saxelis, 


pativis, Rirsebis an saqmiani reputa


ciis SelaxvisaTvis moraluri zianis 


qonebrivi anazRaurebis moTxovna 


sikvdilis Semdeg dauSvebelia. 


    saapelacio palatis ganmartebi

memkvidreobiT ar gadaicema da aRniSn

rvandeli uflebebis da ara

sxva piri anazRaurebis moTxovnis safuZvels moklebulia.

artebiT, marTalia, piradi qonebrivi

da CaiTvalos anazRaureba moraluri

gadawyvetilebis gamotanadme igi gard


aicvala. moraluri zianis fuladi 


sazRauri aseT SemTxvevaSi samkvidro masis Semadgeneli nawilia.

me-18 muxlis me-2 nawilis Tanaxmad


, pirs ufleba aqvs, sasamarTlos 


meSveobiT, kanoniT dadgenili wesiT daicavs sakuTari pativi, Rirseba,
